623211Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass TestDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        using (MD5 md5 = MD5.Create())Di2015NewLine        using (SHA1 sha1 = SHA1.Create())Di2015NewLine        using (Stream input = File.OpenRead("b.txt"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Artificially small to make sure there'sDi2015NewLine            // more than one readDi2015NewLine            byte[] buffer = new byte[4];Di2015NewLine            int bytesRead;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            while ((bytesRead = input.Read(buffer, 0, buffer.Length)) > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                md5.TransformBlock(buffer, 0, bytesRead, null, 0);Di2015NewLine                sha1.TransformBlock(buffer, 0, bytesRead, null, 0);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            md5.TransformFinalBlock(buffer, 0, 0);Di2015NewLine            sha1.TransformFinalBlock(buffer, 0, 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(BitConverter.ToString(md5.Hash));Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(BitConverter.ToString(sha1.Hash));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

624089Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace Event_ExampleDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //First we have to define a delegate that acts as a signature for theDi2015NewLine    //function that is ultimately called when the event is triggered.Di2015NewLine    //You will notice that the second parameter is of MyEventArgs type.Di2015NewLine    //This object will contain information about the triggered event.Di2015NewLine    public delegate void MyEventHandler(object source, MyEventArgs e);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //This is a class which describes the event to the class that recieves it.Di2015NewLine    //An EventArgs class must always derive from System.EventArgs.Di2015NewLine    public class MyEventArgs : EventArgsDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    \private string EventInfo;Di2015NewLine    \public MyEventArgs(string Text)Di2015NewLine    \{Di2015NewLine    \\EventInfo = Text;Di2015NewLine    \}Di2015NewLine    \public string GetInfo()Di2015NewLine    \{Di2015NewLine    \\return EventInfo;Di2015NewLine    \}Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //This next class is the one which contains an event and triggers itDi2015NewLine    //once an action is performed. Notice theDi2015NewLine    //event uses the MyEventHandler delegate to create a signatureDi2015NewLine    //for the called function.Di2015NewLine    public class MyClassDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    \public event MyEventHandler OnMaximum;Di2015NewLine    \private int i;Di2015NewLine    \private int Maximum = 10;Di2015NewLine    \public int MyValueDi2015NewLine    \{Di2015NewLine    \\getDi2015NewLine    \\{Di2015NewLine    \\\return i;Di2015NewLine    \\}Di2015NewLine    \\setDi2015NewLine    \\{Di2015NewLine    \\\if(value <= Maximum)Di2015NewLine    \\\{Di2015NewLine    \\\\i = value;Di2015NewLine    \\\}Di2015NewLine    \\\elseDi2015NewLine    \\\{Di2015NewLine    \\\\//To make sure we only trigger the event if a handler is presentDi2015NewLine    \\\\//we check the event to make sure it's not null.Di2015NewLine    \\\\if(OnMaximum != null)Di2015NewLine    \\\\{Di2015NewLine    \\\\\OnMaximum(this, new MyEventArgs("You've entered " +Di2015NewLine    \\\\\\value.ToString() +Di2015NewLine    \\\\\\", but the maximum is " +Di2015NewLine    \\\\\\Maximum.ToString()));Di2015NewLine    \\\\}Di2015NewLine    \\\}Di2015NewLine    \\}Di2015NewLine    \}Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    \//This is the actual method that will be assigned to the event handlerDi2015NewLine    \//within the above class. This is where we perform an action once theDi2015NewLine    \//event has been triggered.Di2015NewLine    \static void MaximumReached(object source, MyEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    \{Di2015NewLine    \\Console.WriteLine(e.GetInfo());Di2015NewLine    \}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    \static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    \{Di2015NewLine    \\//Now lets test the event contained in the above class.Di2015NewLine    \\MyClass MyObject = new MyClass();Di2015NewLine    \\MyObject.OnMaximum += new MyEventHandler(MaximumReached);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    \\for(int x = 0; x <= 15; x++)Di2015NewLine    \\{Di2015NewLine    \\\MyObject.MyValue = x;Di2015NewLine    \\}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    \\Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine    \}Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

627518Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void CopyAll(DirectoryInfo source, DirectoryInfo target)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            tryDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //check if the target directory existsDi2015NewLine                if (Directory.Exists(target.FullName) == false)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Directory.CreateDirectory(target.FullName);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //copy all the files into the new directoryDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                foreach (FileInfo fi in source.GetFiles())Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    fi.CopyTo(Path.Combine(target.ToString(), fi.Name), true);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //copy all the sub directories using recursionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                foreach (DirectoryInfo diSourceDir in source.GetDirectories())Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    DirectoryInfo nextTargetDir = target.CreateSubdirectory(diSourceDir.Name);Di2015NewLine                    CopyAll(diSourceDir, nextTargetDir);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                //success hereDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (IOException ie)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //handle it hereDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

628814Di2015UniqueSeparatorDispose()
628814Di2015UniqueSeparatordisposing
628814Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class MyResource: IDisposableDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Pointer to an external unmanaged resource.Di2015NewLine    private IntPtr handle;Di2015NewLine    // Other managed resource this class uses.Di2015NewLine    private Component component = new Component();Di2015NewLine    // Track whether Dispose has been called.Di2015NewLine    private bool disposed = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // The class constructor.Di2015NewLine    public MyResource(IntPtr handle)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.handle = handle;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Implement IDisposable.Di2015NewLine    // Do not make this method virtual.Di2015NewLine    // A derived class should not be able to override this method.Di2015NewLine    public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Dispose(true);Di2015NewLine        // This object will be cleaned up by the Dispose method.Di2015NewLine        // Therefore, you should call GC.SupressFinalize toDi2015NewLine        // take this object off the finalization queueDi2015NewLine        // and prevent finalization code for this objectDi2015NewLine        // from executing a second time.Di2015NewLine        GC.SuppressFinalize(this);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Dispose(bool disposing) executes in two distinct scenarios.Di2015NewLine    // If disposing equals true, the method has been called directlyDi2015NewLine    // or indirectly by a user's code. Managed and unmanaged resourcesDi2015NewLine    // can be disposed.Di2015NewLine    // If disposing equals false, the method has been called by theDi2015NewLine    // runtime from inside the finalizer and you should not referenceDi2015NewLine    // other objects. Only unmanaged resources can be disposed.Di2015NewLine    private void Dispose(bool disposing)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Check to see if Dispose has already been called.Di2015NewLine        if(!this.disposed)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // If disposing equals true, dispose all managedDi2015NewLine            // and unmanaged resources.Di2015NewLine            if(disposing)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Dispose managed resources.Di2015NewLine                component.Dispose();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Call the appropriate methods to clean upDi2015NewLine            // unmanaged resources here.Di2015NewLine            // If disposing is false,Di2015NewLine            // only the following code is executed.Di2015NewLine            CloseHandle(handle);Di2015NewLine            handle = IntPtr.Zero;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Note disposing has been done.Di2015NewLine            disposed = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Use interop to call the method necessaryDi2015NewLine    // to clean up the unmanaged resource.Di2015NewLine    [System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImport("Kernel32")]Di2015NewLine    private extern static Boolean CloseHandle(IntPtr handle);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Use C# destructor syntax for finalization code.Di2015NewLine    // This destructor will run only if the Dispose methodDi2015NewLine    // does not get called.Di2015NewLine    // It gives your base class the opportunity to finalize.Di2015NewLine    // Do not provide destructors in types derived from this class.Di2015NewLine    ~MyResource()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Do not re-create Dispose clean-up code here.Di2015NewLine        // Calling Dispose(false) is optimal in terms ofDi2015NewLine        // readability and maintainability.Di2015NewLine        Dispose(false);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
628834Di2015UniqueSeparatorprotected T[] SortLines<T>(Func<T> createLine, IEnumerable<T> unsorted)Di2015NewLinewhere T : LineTypeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Func<IEnumerable<T>, IEnumerable<T>> sorter = (lines => lines);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    switch (settings.OrderSort)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        case OrderSort.ByA: Di2015NewLine            sorter = (lines => lines.OrderBy(x => x.A)); break;Di2015NewLine        case OrderSort.ByB:Di2015NewLine            sorter = (lines => lines.OrderBy(x => x.B)); break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // and so on... a couple cases have several levels of orderingDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    bool requiresSplit = // a complicated conditionDi2015NewLine    if (requiresSplit)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var positives = unsorted.Where(x => x.Qty >= 0);Di2015NewLine        var negatives = unsorted.Where(x => x.Qty <  0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return sorter(negatives).Concat(Di2015NewLine               new T[] { createLine.Invoke() }).Concat(Di2015NewLine               sorter(positives)).ToArray();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine        return sorter(unsorted).ToArray();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

629642Di2015UniqueSeparatormaxPrime
629642Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class PrimeCheckerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private const int BufferSize = 64 * 1024; // 64K * sizeof(int) == 256 KBDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static int[] primes;Di2015NewLine    public static int MaxPrime { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static bool IsPrime(int value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (value <= MaxPrime)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return Array.BinarySearch(primes, value) >= 0;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return IsPrime(value, primes.Length) && IsLargerPrime(value);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static PrimeChecker()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        primes = new int[BufferSize];Di2015NewLine        primes[0] = 2;Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 1, x = 3; i < primes.Length; x += 2)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (IsPrime(x, i))Di2015NewLine                primes[i++] = x;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        MaxPrime = primes[primes.Length - 1];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static bool IsPrime(int value, int primesLength)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < primesLength; ++i)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (value % primes[i] == 0)Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static bool IsLargerPrime(int value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int max = (int)Math.Sqrt(value);Di2015NewLine        for (int i = MaxPrime + 2; i <= max; i += 2)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (value % i == 0)Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

632161Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void SaveUserSettingDefault(string clientSectionName, string settingName, object settingValue)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    System.Configuration.Configuration config = ConfigurationManager.OpenExeConfiguration(ConfigurationUserLevel.None);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // find section groupDi2015NewLine    ConfigurationSectionGroup group = config.SectionGroups[@"userSettings"];Di2015NewLine    if (group == null) return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // find client sectionDi2015NewLine    ClientSettingsSection clientSection = group.Sections[clientSectionName] as ClientSettingsSection;Di2015NewLine    if (clientSection == null) return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // find setting elementDi2015NewLine    SettingElement settingElement = null;Di2015NewLine    foreach (SettingElement s in clientSection.Settings)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (s.Name == settingName)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            settingElement = s;Di2015NewLine            break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (settingElement == null) return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // remove the current valueDi2015NewLine    clientSection.Settings.Remove(settingElement);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // change the valueDi2015NewLine    settingElement.Value.ValueXml.InnerText = settingValue.ToString();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // add the settingDi2015NewLine    clientSection.Settings.Add(settingElement);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // save changesDi2015NewLine    config.Save(ConfigurationSaveMode.Full);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

633534Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Func<R> Memoize<A1,A2,R>(this Func<A1,A2,R> f, A1 a1, A2 a2)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  R value = default(R);Di2015NewLine  bool hasValue = false;Di2015NewLine  return () =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      if (!hasValue)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine        hasValue = true;Di2015NewLine        value = f(a1,a2);Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      return value;Di2015NewLine    };Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
633534Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static Func<A1,A2,R> Memoize<A1,A2,R>(this Func<A1,A2,R> f, IEqualityComparer<KeyValuePair<A1,A2>> comparer)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   var map = new Dictionary<KeyValuePair<A1,A2>,R>(comparer);Di2015NewLine   return (a1,a2) =>Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine         R value;Di2015NewLine         KeyValuePair<A1,A2> key = new KeyValuePair<A1,A2>(a1,a2);Di2015NewLine         if (map.TryGetValue(key, out value)) {Di2015NewLine            return value;Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLine         value = f(a1,a2);Di2015NewLine         map.Add(key, value);Di2015NewLine         return value;Di2015NewLine      };Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

639098Di2015UniqueSeparatorGetHashCode()
639098Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLinestatic class ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // first and second are logically equivalentDi2015NewLine        SimpleTableRow<int> first = new SimpleTableRow<int>(1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6),Di2015NewLine            second = new SimpleTableRow<int>(1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (first.Equals(second) && first.GetHashCode() != second.GetHashCode())Di2015NewLine        { // proven Equals, but GetHashCode() disagreesDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("We have a problem");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        HashSet<SimpleTableRow<int>> set = new HashSet<SimpleTableRow<int>>();Di2015NewLine        set.Add(first);Di2015NewLine        set.Add(second);Di2015NewLine        // which confuses anything that uses hash algorithmsDi2015NewLine        if (set.Count != 1) Console.WriteLine("Yup, very bad indeed");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineclass SimpleTableRow<T> : IEquatable<SimpleTableRow<T>>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public SimpleTableRow(int id, params T[] values) {Di2015NewLine        this.Id = id;Di2015NewLine        this.Values = values;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public int Id { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    public T[] Values { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override int GetHashCode() // wrongDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Id.GetHashCode() ^ Values.GetHashCode();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    /*Di2015NewLine    public override int GetHashCode() // rightDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int hash = Id;Di2015NewLine        if (Values != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            hash = (hash * 17) + Values.Length;Di2015NewLine            foreach (T t in Values)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                hash *= 17;Di2015NewLine                if (t != null) hash = hash + t.GetHashCode();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return hash;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    */Di2015NewLine    public override bool Equals(object obj)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Equals(obj as SimpleTableRow<T>);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public bool Equals(SimpleTableRow<T> other)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Check for nullDi2015NewLine        if (ReferenceEquals(other, null))Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Check for same referenceDi2015NewLine        if (ReferenceEquals(this, other))Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Check for same Id and same ValuesDi2015NewLine        return Id == other.Id && Values.SequenceEqual(other.Values);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

642816Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string EncaseXpathString(string input)Di2015NewLine{         Di2015NewLine    // If we don't have any " then encase string in "Di2015NewLine    if (!input.Contains("\\""))Di2015NewLine        return String.Format("\\"{0}\\"", input);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // If we have some " but no ' then encase in 'Di2015NewLine    if (!input.Contains("'"))Di2015NewLine        return String.Format("'{0}'", input);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // If we get here we have both " and ' in the string so must use ConcatDi2015NewLine    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder("concat(");           Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Going to look for " as they are LESS likely than ' in our data so will minimiseDi2015NewLine    // number of arguments to concat.Di2015NewLine    int lastPos = 0;Di2015NewLine    int nextPos = input.IndexOf("\\"");Di2015NewLine    while (nextPos != -1)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // If this is not the first time through the loop then seperate arguments with ,Di2015NewLine        if (lastPos != 0)Di2015NewLine            sb.Append(",");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        sb.AppendFormat("\\"{0}\\",'\\"'", input.Substring(lastPos, nextPos - lastPos));Di2015NewLine        lastPos = ++nextPos;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Find next occuranceDi2015NewLine        nextPos = input.IndexOf("\\"", lastPos);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    sb.Append(")");Di2015NewLine    return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
642816Di2015UniqueSeparatorXmlNode node = doc.SelectSingleNode("//review[@name=" + EncaseXpathString("Fred's \\"Fancy Pizza\\"" + "]")Di2015NewLine
642816Di2015UniqueSeparatorEncaseXpathString("Pizza Shed") == "'Pizza Shed'";Di2015NewLineEncaseXpathString("Bob's pizza") == "\\"Bob's Pizza\\"";Di2015NewLineEncaseXpathString("\\"Pizza\\" Pam" == "'\\"Pizza\\" Pam'";Di2015NewLineEncaseXpathString("Fred's \\"Fancy Pizza\\"") == "concat(\\"Fred's \\",'\\"',\\"Fancy Pizza\\",'\\"')";Di2015NewLine

645833Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class Foo {     Di2015NewLine  Dictionary<Type, Object> _dict = new Dictionary<Type, Object>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public void Create(string myType, string myValue)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine      Type type = Type.GetType(myType);Di2015NewLine      object value = Convert.ChangeType(myValue, type);Di2015NewLine      _dict[type] = value;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public T GetValue<T>() { return (T)_dict[typeof(T)]; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass TestDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Foo foo = new Foo();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Populate with valuesDi2015NewLine        foo.Create("System.Int32", "15");Di2015NewLine        foo.Create("System.String", "My String");Di2015NewLine        foo.Create("System.Boolean", "False");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(foo.GetValue<int>());Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(foo.GetValue<string>());Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(foo.GetValue<bool>());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

647420Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class MessageStream : IMessageStream, IDisposableDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public MessageStream(Stream stream)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    \if(stream == null)Di2015NewLine    \\throw new ArgumentNullException("stream", "Stream must not be null");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    \if(!stream.CanWrite || !stream.CanRead)Di2015NewLine    \\throw new ArgumentException("Stream must be readable and writable", "stream");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    \this.Stream = stream;Di2015NewLine    \this.readBuffer = new byte[512];Di2015NewLine    \messageBuffer = new List<byte>();Di2015NewLine    \stream.BeginRead(readBuffer, 0, readBuffer.Length, new AsyncCallback(ReadCallback), null);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // These belong to the ReadCallback thread only.Di2015NewLine    private byte[] readBuffer;Di2015NewLine    private List<byte> messageBuffer;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void ReadCallback(IAsyncResult result)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    \int bytesRead = Stream.EndRead(result);Di2015NewLine    \messageBuffer.AddRange(readBuffer.Take(bytesRead));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    \if(messageBuffer.Count >= 4)Di2015NewLine    \{Di2015NewLine    \\int length = BitConverter.ToInt32(messageBuffer.Take(4).ToArray(), 0);\// 4 bytes per int32Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    \\// Keep buffering until we get a full message.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    \\if(messageBuffer.Count >= length + 4)Di2015NewLine    \\{Di2015NewLine    \\\messageBuffer.Skip(4);Di2015NewLine    \\\OnMessageReceived(new MessageEventArgs(messageBuffer.Take(length)));Di2015NewLine    \\\messageBuffer.Skip(length);Di2015NewLine    \\}Di2015NewLine    \}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    \// FIXME below is kinda hacky (I don't know the proper way of doing things...)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    \// Don't bother reading again.  We don't have stream access.Di2015NewLine    \if(disposed)Di2015NewLine    \\return;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    \tryDi2015NewLine    \{Di2015NewLine    \\Stream.BeginRead(readBuffer, 0, readBuffer.Length, new AsyncCallback(ReadCallback), null);Di2015NewLine    \}Di2015NewLine    \catch(ObjectDisposedException)Di2015NewLine    \{Di2015NewLine    \\// DO NOTHINGDi2015NewLine    \\// Ends read loop.Di2015NewLine    \}Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Stream StreamDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    \get;Di2015NewLine    \private set;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public event EventHandler<MessageEventArgs> MessageReceived;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected virtual void OnMessageReceived(MessageEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    \var messageReceived = MessageReceived;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    \if(messageReceived != null)Di2015NewLine    \\messageReceived(this, e);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public virtual void SendMessage(Message message)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    \// Have fun ...Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Dispose stuff hereDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

653397Di2015UniqueSeparator((?:--|/\\*)[^~]*)~(\\*/)?Di2015NewLine
653397Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring code = "all that text of yours";Di2015NewLineRegex regex = new Regex(@"((?:--|/\\*)[^~]*)~(\\*/)?", RegexOptions.Multiline);Di2015NewLineresult = regex.Replace(code, "$1;$2");Di2015NewLine
653397Di2015UniqueSeparator^
653397Di2015UniqueSeparator// ((?:--|/\\*)[^~]*)~(\\*/)?Di2015NewLine// Di2015NewLine// Options: ^ and $ match at line breaksDi2015NewLine// Di2015NewLine// Match the regular expression below and capture its match into backreference number 1 «((?:--|/\\*)[^~]*)»Di2015NewLine//    Match the regular expression below «(?:--|/\\*)»Di2015NewLine//       Match either the regular expression below (attempting the next alternative only if this one fails) «--»Di2015NewLine//          Match the characters “--? literally «--»Di2015NewLine//       Or match regular expression number 2 below (the entire group fails if this one fails to match) «/\\*»Di2015NewLine//          Match the character “/? literally «/»Di2015NewLine//          Match the character “*? literally «\\*»Di2015NewLine//    Match any character that is NOT a “~? «[^~]*»Di2015NewLine//       Between zero and unlimited times, as many times as possible, giving back as needed (greedy) «*»Di2015NewLine// Match the character “~? literally «~»Di2015NewLine// Match the regular expression below and capture its match into backreference number 2 «(\\*/)?»Di2015NewLine//    Between zero and one times, as many times as possible, giving back as needed (greedy) «?»Di2015NewLine//    Match the character “*? literally «\\*»Di2015NewLine//    Match the character “/? literally «/»Di2015NewLine
653449Di2015UniqueSeparatorGetValues()
653449Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring[]

653602Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void RemoveAll<T>(this IList<T> list, Func<T, bool> predicate) {Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < list.Count; i++) {Di2015NewLine        if (predicate(list[i])) {Di2015NewLine            list.RemoveAt(i--);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

656114Di2015UniqueSeparator// Fixed version of GetBits, with padding.Di2015NewLinepublic static string GetBits(string input)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    foreach (byte b in Encoding.Unicode.GetBytes(input))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string lowBits = Convert.ToString(b, 2);Di2015NewLine        string eightBits = lowBits.PadLeft(8, '0');Di2015NewLine        sb.Append(eightBits);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static string UnicodeBitsToString(string input)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return Encoding.Unicode.GetString(ParseHex(input));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static byte[] ParseHex(string input)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    byte[] ret = new byte[input.Length/8];Di2015NewLine    for (int i=0; i < input.Length; i += 8)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ret[i/8] = Convert.ToByte(input.Substring(i, 8), 2);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return ret;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

660156Di2015UniqueSeparatorList<string> GetSomeKeys(string[] cachedKeys, int requestedNumberToGet)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int numberPossibleToGet = Math.Min(cachedKeys.Length, requestedNumberToGet);Di2015NewLine    List<string> keysRemaining = new List<string>(cachedKeys);Di2015NewLine    List<string> keysToReturn = new List<string>(numberPossibleToGet);Di2015NewLine    Random rand = new Random();Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < numberPossibleToGet; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int randomIndex = rand.Next(keysRemaining.Count);Di2015NewLine        keysToReturn.Add(keysRemaining[randomIndex]);Di2015NewLine        keysRemaining.RemoveAt(randomIndex);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return keysToReturn;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
660156Di2015UniqueSeparatorList<string> GetSomeKeysSwapping(string[] cachedKeys, int requestedNumberToGet)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int numberPossibleToGet = Math.Min(cachedKeys.Length, requestedNumberToGet);Di2015NewLine    List<string> keys = new List<string>(cachedKeys);Di2015NewLine    List<string> keysToReturn = new List<string>(numberPossibleToGet);Di2015NewLine    Random rand = new Random();Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < numberPossibleToGet; i++)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int index = rand.Next(numberPossibleToGet - i) + i;Di2015NewLine        keysToReturn.Add(keys[index]);Di2015NewLine        keys[index] = keys[i];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return keysToReturn;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineList<string> GetSomeKeysEnumerable(string[] cachedKeys, int requestedNumberToGet)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Random rand = new Random();Di2015NewLine    return TakeRandom(cachedKeys, requestedNumberToGet, rand).ToList();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

             Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine              var groups = match.Groups;Di2015NewLine              var s = (groups.Count>0) ?groups[groups.Count-1].ToString()Di2015NewLine                                       :match.Value;Di2015NewLine              var _uri   = new Uri(dilbertUrl, s);Di2015NewLine              var imgReq = WebRequest.CreateDefault(_uri);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine              imgReq.BeginGetResponse(ar2 => Di2015NewLine              {  var imageRsp= (HttpWebResponse)imgReq.EndGetResponse(ar2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                 using (var imgStream=imageRsp.GetResponseStream())Di2015NewLine                 { Di2015NewLine                    var im=(Image)Image.FromStream(imgStream,true,true);Di2015NewLine                    returnValue = (Image) im.Clone();Di2015NewLine                 }    Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                 imgHandle.Set(); 661706Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate delegate void SetPropertyThreadSafeDelegate<TResult>(Control @this, Expression<Func<TResult>> property, TResult value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static void SetPropertyThreadSafe<TResult>(this Control @this, Expression<Func<TResult>> property, TResult value)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  var propertyInfo = (property.Body as MemberExpression).Member as PropertyInfo;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  if (propertyInfo == null ||Di2015NewLine      !@this.GetType().IsSubclassOf(propertyInfo.ReflectedType) ||Di2015NewLine      @this.GetType().GetProperty(propertyInfo.Name, propertyInfo.PropertyType) == null)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    throw new ArgumentException("The lambda expression 'property' must reference a valid property on this Control.");Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  if (@this.InvokeRequired)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    @this.Invoke(new SetPropertyThreadSafeDelegate<TResult>(SetPropertyThreadSafe), new object[] { @this, property, value });Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  elseDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    @this.GetType().InvokeMember(propertyInfo.Name, BindingFlags.SetProperty, null, @this, new object[] { value });Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

662547Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic DateTime FirstDateOfWeek(int year, int weekNum, CalendarWeekRule rule)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Debug.Assert(weekNum >= 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    DateTime jan1 = new DateTime(year, 1, 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    int daysOffset = DayOfWeek.Monday - jan1.DayOfWeek;Di2015NewLine    DateTime firstMonday = jan1.AddDays(daysOffset);Di2015NewLine    Debug.Assert(firstMonday.DayOfWeek == DayOfWeek.Monday);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var cal = CultureInfo.CurrentCulture.Calendar;Di2015NewLine    int firstWeek = cal.GetWeekOfYear(firstMonday, rule, DayOfWeek.Monday);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (firstWeek <= 1)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        weekNum -= 1;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    DateTime result = firstMonday.AddDays(weekNum * 7);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

662657Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class TypeHelpersDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Gets the System.Type with the specified name, performing a case-sensitive search.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="typeName">The assembly-qualified name of the type to get. See System.Type.AssemblyQualifiedName.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="throwOnError">Whether or not to throw an exception or return null if the type was not found.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="ignoreCase">Whether or not to perform a case-insensitive search.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>The System.Type with the specified name.</returns>Di2015NewLine    /// <remarks>Di2015NewLine    /// This method can load types from dynamically loaded assemblies as long as the referenced assembly Di2015NewLine    /// has already been loaded into the current AppDomain.Di2015NewLine    /// </remarks>Di2015NewLine    public static Type GetType(string typeName, bool throwOnError, bool ignoreCase)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if(string.IsNullOrEmpty(typeName))Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("typeName");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // handle the trivial caseDi2015NewLine        Type type;Di2015NewLine        if((type = Type.GetType(typeName, false, ignoreCase)) != null)Di2015NewLine            return type;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // otherwise, perform the recursive searchDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return GetTypeFromRecursive(typeName, ignoreCase);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch(Exception e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if(throwOnError)Di2015NewLine                throw;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region Private Static Helper MethodsDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static Type GetTypeFromRecursive(string typeName, bool ignoreCase)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int startIndex = typeName.IndexOf('[');Di2015NewLine        int endIndex = typeName.LastIndexOf(']');Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if(startIndex == -1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // try to load the non-generic type (e.g. System.Int32)Di2015NewLine            return TypeHelpers.GetNonGenericType(typeName, ignoreCase);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // determine the cardinality of the generic typeDi2015NewLine            int cardinalityIndex = typeName.IndexOf('`', 0, startIndex);Di2015NewLine            string cardinalityString = typeName.Substring(cardinalityIndex + 1, startIndex - cardinalityIndex - 1);Di2015NewLine            int cardinality = int.Parse(cardinalityString);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // get the FullName of the non-generic type (e.g. System.Collections.Generic.List`1)Di2015NewLine            string fullName = typeName.Substring(0, startIndex);Di2015NewLine            if(typeName.Length - endIndex - 1 > 0)Di2015NewLine                fullName += typeName.Substring(endIndex + 1, typeName.Length - endIndex - 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // parse the child type arguments for this generic type (recursive)Di2015NewLine            List<Type> list = new List<Type>();Di2015NewLine            string typeArguments = typeName.Substring(startIndex + 1, endIndex - startIndex - 1);Di2015NewLine            foreach(string item in EachAssemblyQualifiedName(typeArguments, cardinality))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Type typeArgument = GetTypeFromRecursive(item, ignoreCase);Di2015NewLine                list.Add(typeArgument);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // construct the generic type definitionDi2015NewLine            return TypeHelpers.GetNonGenericType(fullName, ignoreCase).MakeGenericType(list.ToArray());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static IEnumerable<string> EachAssemblyQualifiedName(string s, int count)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert(count != 0);Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert(string.IsNullOrEmpty(s) == false);Di2015NewLine        Debug.Assert(s.Length > 2);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // e.g. "[System.String, mscorlib, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089]"Di2015NewLine        // e.g. "[System.String, mscorlib, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089],[System.DateTime, mscorlib, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089]"Di2015NewLine        // e.g. "[System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair`2[[System.Int32, mscorlib, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089],[System.DateTime, mscorlib, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089]], mscorlib, Version=2.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b77a5c561934e089]"Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int startIndex = 0;Di2015NewLine        int bracketCount = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        while(count > 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            bracketCount = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for(int i = startIndex; i < s.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                switch(s[i])Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    case '[':Di2015NewLine                        bracketCount++;Di2015NewLine                        continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    case ']':Di2015NewLine                        if(--bracketCount == 0)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            string item = s.Substring(startIndex + 1, i - startIndex - 1);Di2015NewLine                            yield return item;Di2015NewLine                            startIndex = i + 2;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    default:Di2015NewLine                        continue;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if(bracketCount != 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                const string SR_Malformed = "The brackets are unbalanced in the string, '{0}'.";Di2015NewLine                throw new FormatException(string.Format(SR_Malformed, s));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            count--;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static Type GetNonGenericType(string typeName, bool ignoreCase)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // assume the type information is not a dynamically loaded assemblyDi2015NewLine        Type type = Type.GetType(typeName, false, ignoreCase);Di2015NewLine        if(type != null)Di2015NewLine            return type;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // otherwise, search the assemblies in the current AppDomain for the typeDi2015NewLine        int assemblyFullNameIndex = typeName.IndexOf(',');Di2015NewLine        if(assemblyFullNameIndex != -1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string assemblyFullName = typeName.Substring(assemblyFullNameIndex + 2, typeName.Length - assemblyFullNameIndex - 2);Di2015NewLine            foreach(Assembly assembly in AppDomain.CurrentDomain.GetAssemblies())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if(assembly.GetName().FullName == assemblyFullName)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    string fullName = typeName.Substring(0, assemblyFullNameIndex);Di2015NewLine                    type = assembly.GetType(fullName, false, ignoreCase);Di2015NewLine                    if(type != null)Di2015NewLine                        return type;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // no luck? blow upDi2015NewLine        const string SR_TypeNotFound = "The type, '{0}', was not found.";Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException(string.Format(SR_TypeNotFound, typeName), "typeName");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

Font.Height / 2)Di2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLine            // getting close to bottom, ensure next item is visibleDi2015NewLine            mintScrollDirection = SB_LINEDOWN;Di2015NewLine            tmrLVScroll.Enabled = true;Di2015NewLine        }else{Di2015NewLine            tmrLVScroll.Enabled = false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void tmrLVScroll_Tick(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        SendMessage(Handle, WM_VSCROLL, (IntPtr)mintScrollDirection, IntPtr.Zero);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

665591Di2015UniqueSeparatorconst int TimedOutExceptionCode = -2147467259;Di2015NewLinepublic static bool IsMaxRequestExceededException(Exception e)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // unhandled errors = caught at global.ascx levelDi2015NewLine    // http exception = caught at page levelDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Exception main;Di2015NewLine    var unhandled = e as HttpUnhandledException;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (unhandled != null && unhandled.ErrorCode == TimedOutExceptionCode)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        main = unhandled.InnerException;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        main = e;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var http = main as HttpException;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (http != null && http.ErrorCode == TimedOutExceptionCode)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // hack: no real method of identifying if the error is max request exceeded as Di2015NewLine        // it is treated as a timeout exceptionDi2015NewLine        if (http.StackTrace.Contains("GetEntireRawContent"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // MAX REQUEST HAS BEEN EXCEEDEDDi2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return false;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
665623Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string SetConnectionString(Type assemblyMember,Di2015NewLine                                         Type settingsClass,Di2015NewLine                                         string newConnectionString,Di2015NewLine                                         string connectionStringKey)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  Type typSettings = Type.GetType(Assembly.CreateQualifiedName(assemblyMember.Assembly.FullName, settingsClass.FullName));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  if (typSettings == null)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    return null;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  PropertyInfo prpDefault = typSettings.GetProperty("Default", BindingFlags.Static | BindingFlags.Public);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  if (prpDefault == null)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    return null;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  object objSettings = prpDefault.GetValue(null, null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  if (objSettings == null)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    return null;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // the default property, this[], is actually named ItemDi2015NewLine  PropertyInfo prpItem = objSettings.GetType().GetProperty("Item", BindingFlags.Instance | BindingFlags.Public);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  if (prpItem == null)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    return null;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  object[] indexerName = { connectionStringKey };Di2015NewLine  string oldConnectionString = (string)prpItem.GetValue(objSettings, indexerName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  prpItem.SetValue(objSettings, newConnectionString, indexerName);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  return oldConnectionString;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

666298Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring subjectString = "<!--X1-->Hi<!--X1-->there<!--X2--><!--X1-->Hi<!--X1-->there<!--X2-->";Di2015NewLinevar regex = new Regex(@"<!--X\\d-->");Di2015NewLinevar matches = regex.Matches(subjectString);Di2015NewLinevar uniqueMatches = matchesDi2015NewLine    .OfType<Match>()Di2015NewLine    .Select(m => m.Value)Di2015NewLine    .Distinct();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineuniqueMatches.ToList().ForEach(Console.WriteLine);Di2015NewLine
666298Di2015UniqueSeparator<!--X1-->  Di2015NewLine<!--X2-->Di2015NewLine
666298Di2015UniqueSeparator(<!--X\\d-->)(?!.*\\1.*)Di2015NewLine
666298Di2015UniqueSeparator// (<!--X\\d-->)(?!.*\\1.*)Di2015NewLine// Di2015NewLine// Options: dot matches newlineDi2015NewLine// Di2015NewLine// Match the regular expression below and capture its match into backreference number 1 «(<!--X\\d-->)»Di2015NewLine//    Match the characters “<!--X? literally «<!--X»Di2015NewLine//    Match a single digit 0..9 «\\d»Di2015NewLine//    Match the characters “-->? literally «-->»Di2015NewLine// Assert that it is impossible to match the regex below starting at this position (negative lookahead) «(?!.*\\1.*)»Di2015NewLine//    Match any single character «.*»Di2015NewLine//       Between zero and unlimited times, as many times as possible, giving back as needed (greedy) «*»Di2015NewLine//    Match the same text as most recently matched by capturing group number 1 «\\1»Di2015NewLine//    Match any single character «.*»Di2015NewLine//       Between zero and unlimited times, as many times as possible, giving back as needed (greedy) «*»Di2015NewLine

666560Di2015UniqueSeparatorprotected void btnPostBack2_Click(object sender, EventArgs e) Di2015NewLine{ Di2015NewLine  System.Text.StringBuilder sb = new System.Text.StringBuilder(); Di2015NewLine  sb.Append("<script language='javascript'>function ChangeColor() {"); Di2015NewLine  sb.Append("var lbl = document.getElementById('lblDisplayDate');"); Di2015NewLine  sb.Append("lbl.style.color='green';"); Di2015NewLine  sb.Append("}</script>"); Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  //Render the function definition. 667927Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid smartSplit(string const& text, char delim, char esc, vector<string>& tokens)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    enum State { NORMAL, IN_ESC };Di2015NewLine    State state = NORMAL;Di2015NewLine    string frag;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    for (size_t i = 0; i<text.length(); ++i)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    \char c = text[i];Di2015NewLine    \switch (state)Di2015NewLine    \{Di2015NewLine    \case NORMAL:Di2015NewLine    \\if (c == delim)Di2015NewLine    \\{Di2015NewLine    \\\if (!frag.empty())Di2015NewLine    \\\\tokens.push_back(frag);Di2015NewLine    \\\frag.clear();Di2015NewLine    \\}Di2015NewLine    \\else if (c == esc)Di2015NewLine    \\\state = IN_ESC;Di2015NewLine    \\elseDi2015NewLine    \\\frag.append(1, c);Di2015NewLine    \\break;Di2015NewLine    \case IN_ESC:Di2015NewLine    \\frag.append(1, c);Di2015NewLine    \\state = NORMAL;Di2015NewLine    \\break;Di2015NewLine    \}Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (!frag.empty())Di2015NewLine    \tokens.push_back(frag);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
668003Di2015UniqueSeparatorenum TokenTypeDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    ColumnData,Di2015NewLine    Comma,Di2015NewLine    LineTerminatorDi2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass TokenDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public TokenType Type { get; private set;}Di2015NewLine    public string Data { get; private set;}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Token(TokenType type)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Type = type;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Token(TokenType type, string data)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Type = type;Di2015NewLine        Data = data;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate  IEnumerable<Token> GetTokens(TextReader s)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   var builder = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   while (s.Peek() >= 0)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine       var c = (char)s.Read();Di2015NewLine       switch (c)Di2015NewLine       {Di2015NewLine           case ',':Di2015NewLine           {Di2015NewLine               if (builder.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine               {Di2015NewLine                   yield return new Token(TokenType.ColumnData, ExtractText(builder));Di2015NewLine               }Di2015NewLine               yield return new Token(TokenType.Comma);Di2015NewLine               break;Di2015NewLine           }Di2015NewLine           case '\\r':Di2015NewLine           {Di2015NewLine                var next = s.Peek();Di2015NewLine                if (next == '\\n')Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    s.Read();Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (builder.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    yield return new Token(TokenType.ColumnData, ExtractText(builder));Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                yield return new Token(TokenType.LineTerminator);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine           }Di2015NewLine           default:Di2015NewLine               builder.Append(c);Di2015NewLine               break;Di2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   s.Read();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine   if (builder.Length > 0)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine       yield return new Token(TokenType.ColumnData, ExtractText(builder));Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate string ExtractText(StringBuilder b)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var ret = b.ToString();Di2015NewLine    b.Remove(0, b.Length);Di2015NewLine    return ret;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
668003Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void ConvertXLS(TextReader s)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var columnData = new List<string>();Di2015NewLine    bool lastWasColumnData = false;Di2015NewLine    bool seenAnyData = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (var token in GetTokens(s))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        switch (token.Type)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case TokenType.ColumnData:Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                 seenAnyData = true;Di2015NewLine                 if (lastWasColumnData)Di2015NewLine                 {Di2015NewLine                     //TODO: do some error reportingDi2015NewLine                 }Di2015NewLine                 elseDi2015NewLine                 {Di2015NewLine                     lastWasColumnData = true;Di2015NewLine                     columnData.Add(token.Data);Di2015NewLine                 }Di2015NewLine                 break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            case TokenType.Comma:Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (!lastWasColumnData)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    columnData.Add(null);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                lastWasColumnData = false;Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            case TokenType.LineTerminator:Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (seenAnyData)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    OutputLine(lastWasColumnData);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                seenAnyData = false;Di2015NewLine                lastWasColumnData = false;Di2015NewLine                columnData.Clear();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    if (seenAnyData)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        OutputLine(columnData);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

670068Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static int GetOrderIndependentHashCode<T>(IEnumerable<T> source)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int hash = 0;Di2015NewLine    foreach (T element in source)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        hash = hash ^ EqualityComparer<T>.Default.GetHashCode(element);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return hash;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
670068Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static int GetOrderIndependentHashCode<T>(IEnumerable<T> source)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int hash = 0;Di2015NewLine    foreach (T element in source)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        hash = unchecked (hash + Di2015NewLine            EqualityComparer<T>.Default.GetHashCode(element));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return hash;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
670068Di2015UniqueSeparatorunchecked
670068Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static int GetOrderIndependentHashCode<T>(IEnumerable<T> source)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int hash = 0;Di2015NewLine    int curHash;Di2015NewLine    int bitOffset = 0;Di2015NewLine    // Stores number of occurences so far of each value.Di2015NewLine    var valueCounts = new Dictionary<T, int>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (T element in source)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        curHash = EqualityComparer<T>.Default.GetHashCode(element);Di2015NewLine        if (valueCounts.TryGetValue(element, out bitOffset))Di2015NewLine            valueCounts[element] = bitOffset + 1;Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine            valueCounts.Add(element, bitOffset);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // The current hash code is shifted (with wrapping) one bitDi2015NewLine        // further left on each successive recurrence of a certainDi2015NewLine        // value to widen the distribution.Di2015NewLine        // 37 is an arbitrary low prime number that helps theDi2015NewLine        // algorithm to smooth out the distribution.Di2015NewLine        hash = unchecked(hash + ((curHash << bitOffset) |Di2015NewLine            (curHash >> (32 - bitOffset))) * 37);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return hash;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
670068Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static int GetOrderIndependentHashCode<T>(IEnumerable<T> source)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int hash = 0;Di2015NewLine    foreach (T element in source)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int h = EqualityComparer<T>.Default.GetHashCode(element);Di2015NewLine        if (h != 0)Di2015NewLine            hash = unchecked (hash * h);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return hash;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
670068Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static int GetOrderIndependentHashCode<T>(IEnumerable<T> source)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int hash = 0;Di2015NewLine    foreach (T element in source.OrderBy(x => x, Comparer<T>.Default))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // f is any function/code you like returning intDi2015NewLine        hash = f(hash, element);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return hash;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

673657Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic interface IMatcherDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Return the number of characters that this "regex" or equivalentDi2015NewLine    /// matches.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="text">The text to be matched</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>The number of characters that matched</returns>Di2015NewLine    int Match(string text);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinesealed class RegexMatcher : IMatcherDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly Regex regex;Di2015NewLine    public RegexMatcher(string regex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.regex = new Regex(string.Format("^{0}", regex));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int Match(string text)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var m = regex.Match(text);Di2015NewLine        return m.Success ? m.Length : 0;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override string ToString()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return regex.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic sealed class TokenDefinitionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public readonly IMatcher Matcher;Di2015NewLine    public readonly object Token;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public TokenDefinition(string regex, object token)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.Matcher = new RegexMatcher(regex);Di2015NewLine        this.Token = token;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic sealed class Lexer : IDisposableDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private readonly TextReader reader;Di2015NewLine    private readonly TokenDefinition[] tokenDefinitions;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private string lineRemaining;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Lexer(TextReader reader, TokenDefinition[] tokenDefinitions)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.reader = reader;Di2015NewLine        this.tokenDefinitions = tokenDefinitions;Di2015NewLine        nextLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void nextLine()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        doDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            lineRemaining = reader.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine            ++LineNumber;Di2015NewLine            Position = 0;Di2015NewLine        } while (lineRemaining != null && lineRemaining.Length == 0);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool Next()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (lineRemaining == null)Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        foreach (var def in tokenDefinitions)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var matched = def.Matcher.Match(lineRemaining);Di2015NewLine            if (matched > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Position += matched;Di2015NewLine                Token = def.Token;Di2015NewLine                TokenContents = lineRemaining.Substring(0, matched);Di2015NewLine                lineRemaining = lineRemaining.Substring(matched);Di2015NewLine                if (lineRemaining.Length == 0)Di2015NewLine                    nextLine();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                return true;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        throw new Exception(string.Format("Unable to match against any tokens at line {0} position {1} \\"{2}\\"",Di2015NewLine                                          LineNumber, Position, lineRemaining));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string TokenContents { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public object Token { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int LineNumber { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int Position { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        reader.Dispose();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
673657Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring sample = @"( one (two 456 -43.2 "" \\"" quoted"" ))";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinevar defs = new TokenDefinition[]Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // Thanks to [steven levithan][2] for this great quoted stringDi2015NewLine            // regexDi2015NewLine    new TokenDefinition(@"([""'])(?:\\\\\\1|.)*?\\1", "QUOTED-STRING"),Di2015NewLine    // Thanks to http://www.regular-expressions.info/floatingpoint.htmlDi2015NewLine    new TokenDefinition(@"[-+]?\\d*\\.\\d+([eE][-+]?\\d+)?", "FLOAT"),Di2015NewLine    new TokenDefinition(@"[-+]?\\d+", "INT"),Di2015NewLine    new TokenDefinition(@"#t", "TRUE"),Di2015NewLine    new TokenDefinition(@"#f", "FALSE"),Di2015NewLine    new TokenDefinition(@"[*<>\\?\\-+/A-Za-z->!]+", "SYMBOL"),Di2015NewLine    new TokenDefinition(@"\\.", "DOT"),Di2015NewLine    new TokenDefinition(@"\\(", "LEFT"),Di2015NewLine    new TokenDefinition(@"\\)", "RIGHT"),Di2015NewLine    new TokenDefinition(@"\\s", "SPACE")Di2015NewLine};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineTextReader r = new StringReader(sample);Di2015NewLineLexer l = new Lexer(r, defs);Di2015NewLinewhile (l.Next())Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("Token: {0} Contents: {1}", l.Token, l.TokenContents);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
673657Di2015UniqueSeparatorToken: LEFT Contents: (Di2015NewLineToken: SPACE Contents:Di2015NewLineToken: SYMBOL Contents: oneDi2015NewLineToken: SPACE Contents:Di2015NewLineToken: LEFT Contents: (Di2015NewLineToken: SYMBOL Contents: twoDi2015NewLineToken: SPACE Contents:Di2015NewLineToken: INT Contents: 456Di2015NewLineToken: SPACE Contents:Di2015NewLineToken: FLOAT Contents: -43.2Di2015NewLineToken: SPACE Contents:Di2015NewLineToken: QUOTED-STRING Contents: " \\" quoted"Di2015NewLineToken: SPACE Contents:Di2015NewLineToken: RIGHT Contents: )Di2015NewLineToken: RIGHT Contents: )Di2015NewLine
673689Di2015UniqueSeparator// birth dateDi2015NewLineDateTime birthDate = new DateTime(1968, 07, 14);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// get current date (don't call DateTime.Today repeatedly, as it changes)Di2015NewLineDateTime today = DateTime.Today;Di2015NewLine// get the last birthdayDi2015NewLineint years = today.Year - birthDate.Year;Di2015NewLineDateTime last = birthDate.AddYears(years);Di2015NewLineif (last > today) {Di2015NewLine\last = last.AddYears(-1);Di2015NewLine\years--;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine// get the next birthdayDi2015NewLineDateTime next = last.AddYears(1);Di2015NewLine// calculate the number of days between themDi2015NewLinedouble yearDays = (next - last).Days;Di2015NewLine// calcluate the number of days since last birthdayDi2015NewLinedouble days = (today - last).Days;Di2015NewLine// calculate exaxt ageDi2015NewLinedouble exactAge = (double)years + (days / yearDays);Di2015NewLine

676344Di2015UniqueSeparator// Note that powers of 2 are used; each value has only a single bit setDi2015NewLinepublic static int MOD_ALT = 0x1;     // If bit 0 is set, Alt is pressedDi2015NewLinepublic static int MOD_CONTROL = 0x2; // If bit 1 is set, Ctrl is pressedDi2015NewLinepublic static int MOD_SHIFT = 0x4;   // If bit 2 is set, Shift is pressed Di2015NewLinepublic static int MOD_WIN = 0x8;     // If bit 3 is set, Win is pressedDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// If we wanted to represent a combination of keys:Di2015NewLineint altAndControl = MOD_ALT | MOD_CONTROL; // == 3Di2015NewLineint controlAndShift = MOD_CONTROL | MOD_SHIFT; // == 6Di2015NewLine

676478Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic void RegisterAction(ActionData actionData, EventInfo eventInfo, Di2015NewLine    Control control)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    MethodInfo methodInfo = eventInfo.EventHandlerType.GetMethod("Invoke");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    List<Type> ps = new List<Type>();Di2015NewLine    ps.Add  (typeof (ActionData)) ;Di2015NewLine    foreach (ParameterInfo info in methodInfo.GetParameters())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        ps.Add(info.ParameterType);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     DynamicMethod method = new DynamicMethod("Adapter",Di2015NewLine                                              typeof (void),Di2015NewLine                                              ps.ToArray(),Di2015NewLine                                              GetType(), Di2015NewLine                                              true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     // compatible signatures for ExecuteActionDi2015NewLine     // (assuming you aren't interested in sender and eventArgs):Di2015NewLine     // static void ExecuteAction (ActionData) ;Di2015NewLine     // void ActionData.ExecuteAction () ;Di2015NewLine     MethodInfo miExecuteAction = <...> ;Di2015NewLine     ILGenerator generator = method.GetILGenerator();Di2015NewLine     generator.Emit (OpCodes.Ldarg_0) ;Di2015NewLine     generator.Emit (OpCodes.Call, miExecuteAction) ;Di2015NewLine     generator.Emit (OpCodes.Ret) ;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     // if you want to pass this to ExecuteAction, Di2015NewLine     // you'll need to put it into actionData.Di2015NewLine     Delegate proxy = method.CreateDelegate(eventInfo.EventHandlerType, actionData);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     eventInfo.AddEventHandler(control, proxy);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
676478Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void Execute<T> (ActionData data, object sender, T args)Di2015NewLine    where T : EventArgsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    ExecuteAction (data) ;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic void RegisterAction (ActionData actionData, EventInfo eventInfo, Di2015NewLine    Control control)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    MethodInfo compatibleMethod = typeof (this).GetMethod ("Execute",Di2015NewLine        BindingFlags.Static | BindingFlags.Public).MakeGenericMethod (Di2015NewLine        eventInfo.EventHandlerType.GetMethod ("Invoke").GetParameters ()[1].ParameterType)) ;Di2015NewLine    eventInfo.AddEventHandler (control, Di2015NewLine        Delegate.CreateDelegate (eventInfo.EventHandlerType, actionData,Di2015NewLine        compatibleMethod)) ;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

677616Di2015UniqueSeparator    static void problem16a()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        const int limit = 1000;Di2015NewLine        int ints = limit / 29;Di2015NewLine        int[] number = new int[ints + 1];Di2015NewLine        number[0] = 2;Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 2; i <= limit; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            doubleNumber(number);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        String text = NumberToString(number);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(text);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("The sum of digits of 2^" + limit + " is " + sumDigits(text));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void doubleNumber(int[] n)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int carry = 0;Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < n.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            n[i] <<= 1;Di2015NewLine            n[i] += carry;Di2015NewLine            if (n[i] >= 1000000000)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                carry = 1;Di2015NewLine                n[i] -= 1000000000;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                carry = 0;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static String NumberToString(int[] n)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int i = n.Length;Di2015NewLine        while (i > 0 && n[--i] == 0)Di2015NewLine            ;Di2015NewLine        String ret = "" + n[i--];Di2015NewLine        while (i >= 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ret += String.Format("{0:000000000}", n[i--]);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return ret;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

679537Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class AggregateUnchanged {Di2015NewLine    public static string Run(string input) {Di2015NewLine        return inputDi2015NewLine            .Reverse()Di2015NewLine            .Select(x => x.ToString())Di2015NewLine            .Aggregate((x, y) => x + "." + y);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static class WithStringBuilder {Di2015NewLine    public static string Run(string input) {Di2015NewLine        var builder = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        foreach (var cur in input.Reverse()) {Di2015NewLine            builder.Append(cur);Di2015NewLine            builder.Append('.');Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (builder.Length > 0) {Di2015NewLine            builder.Length = builder.Length - 1;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return builder.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass Program {Di2015NewLine    public static void RunAndPrint(string name, List<string> inputs, Func<string, string> worker) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Test case. JIT the code and verify it actually works Di2015NewLine        var test = worker("123456");Di2015NewLine        if (test != "6.5.4.3.2.1") {Di2015NewLine            throw new InvalidOperationException("Bad algorithm");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var watch = new Stopwatch();Di2015NewLine        watch.Start();Di2015NewLine        foreach (var cur in inputs) {Di2015NewLine            var result = worker(cur);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        watch.Stop();Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("{0} ({2} elements): {1}", name, watch.Elapsed, inputs.Count);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static string NextInput(Random r) {Di2015NewLine        var len = r.Next(1, 1000);Di2015NewLine        var builder = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < len; i++) {Di2015NewLine            builder.Append(r.Next(0, 9));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return builder.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void RunAll(List<string> input) {Di2015NewLine        RunAndPrint("Normal Aggregate", input, AggregateUnchanged.Run);Di2015NewLine        RunAndPrint("WithStringBuilder", input, WithStringBuilder.Run);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args) {Di2015NewLine        var random = new Random((int)DateTime.Now.Ticks);Di2015NewLine        RunAll(Enumerable.Range(0, 100).Select(_ => NextInput(random)).ToList());Di2015NewLine        RunAll(Enumerable.Range(0, 1000).Select(_ => NextInput(random)).ToList());Di2015NewLine        RunAll(Enumerable.Range(0, 10000).Select(_ => NextInput(random)).ToList());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

680599Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private volatile bool AbortOperation;Di2015NewLine    Func<bool> AbortOperationDelegate;Di2015NewLine    FinishProcessDelegate finishDelegate;Di2015NewLine    UpdateGUIDelegate updateGUIDelegate;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private delegate void UpdateGUIDelegate(int progress, object message);Di2015NewLine    private delegate void FinishProcessDelegate();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void cmdBegin_Click(...)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Create finish delegate, for determining when the thread is done.Di2015NewLine        finishDelegate = new FinishProcessDelegate(ProcessFinished);Di2015NewLine        // A delegate for updating the GUI.Di2015NewLine        updateGUIDelegate = new UpdateGUIDelegate(UpdateGUI);Di2015NewLine        // Create a delegate function for abortion.Di2015NewLine        AbortOperationDelegate = () => AbortOperation;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Thread BackgroundThread = new Thread(new ThreadStart(StartProcess));            Di2015NewLine        // Force single apartment state. Required by ArcGIS.Di2015NewLine        BackgroundThread.SetApartmentState(ApartmentState.STA);Di2015NewLine        BackgroundThread.Start();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void StartProcess()Di2015NewLine    {    Di2015NewLine        // Update GUI.Di2015NewLine        updateGUIDelegate(0, "Beginning process...");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Create object.Di2015NewLine        Converter converter = new Converter(AbortOperationDelegate);Di2015NewLine        // Parse the GUI update method to the converter, so it can update the GUI from within the converter. Di2015NewLine        converter.Progress += new ProcessEventHandler(UpdateGUI);Di2015NewLine        // Begin converting.Di2015NewLine        converter.Execute();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Tell the main thread, that the process has finished.Di2015NewLine        FinishProcessDelegate finishDelegate = new FinishProcessDelegate(ProcessFinished);Di2015NewLine        Invoke(finishDelegate);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Update GUI.Di2015NewLine        updateGUIDelegate(100, "Process has finished.");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void cmdAbort_Click(...)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        AbortOperation = true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void ProcessFinished()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Post processing.Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void UpdateGUI(int progress, object message)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // If the call has been placed at the local thread, call it on the main thread.Di2015NewLine        if (this.pgStatus.InvokeRequired)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            UpdateGUIDelegate guidelegate = new UpdateGUIDelegate(UpdateGUI);Di2015NewLine            this.Invoke(guidelegate, new object[] { progress, message });Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // The call was made on the main thread, update the GUI.Di2015NewLine            pgStatus.Value = progress;Di2015NewLine            lblStatus.Text = (string)message;   Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class ConverterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private Func<bool> AbortOperation { get; set;}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Converter(Func<bool> abortOperation)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        AbortOperation = abortOperation;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Execute()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Calculations using ArcGIS are done here.Di2015NewLine        while(...) // Insert your own criteria here.Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Update GUI, and replace the '...' with the progress.Di2015NewLine            OnProgressChange(new ProgressEventArgs(..., "Still working..."));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Check for abortion at anytime here...Di2015NewLine            if(AbortOperation)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public event ProgressEventHandler Progress;Di2015NewLine    private virtual void OnProgressChange(ProgressEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var p = Progress;Di2015NewLine        if (p != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Invoke the delegate. Di2015NewLine        p(e.Progress, e.Message);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }    Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class ProgressEventArgs : EventArgsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public int Progress { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public string Message { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public ProgressEventArgs(int _progress, string _message)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Progress = _progress;Di2015NewLine        Message = _message;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic delegate void ProgressEventHandler(int percentProgress, object userState);Di2015NewLine

682931Di2015UniqueSeparator// From http://community.bartdesmet.net/blogs/bart/archive/2008/11/03/c-4-0-feature-focus-part-3-intermezzo-linq-s-new-zip-operator.aspxDi2015NewLinepublic static IEnumerable<TResult> Zip<TFirst, TSecond, TResult>(this IEnumerable<TFirst> first, IEnumerable<TSecond> second, Func<TFirst, TSecond, TResult> func) {Di2015NewLine    if (first == null) Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("first");Di2015NewLine    if (second == null) Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("second");Di2015NewLine    if (func == null)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("func");Di2015NewLine    using (var ie1 = first.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine    using (var ie2 = second.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine        while (ie1.MoveNext() && ie2.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine            yield return func(ie1.Current, ie2.Current);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static IEnumerable<KeyValuePair<T, R>> Zip<T, R>(this IEnumerable<T> first, IEnumerable<R> second) {Di2015NewLine    return first.Zip(second, (f, s) => new KeyValuePair<T, R>(f, s));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

688388Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.Generic;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineusing System.Collections.ObjectModel;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows.Threading;Di2015NewLineusing System.Windows;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace WpfApplication1Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public class NotificationDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public DateTime TimeStamp { get; 688855Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic byte[] CryptExportKey(SymmetricAlgorithm key, RSA publicKey){Di2015NewLine  using(MemoryStream ms = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine  using(BinaryWriter w = new BinaryWriter(w)){Di2015NewLine    w.Write((byte) 0x01); // SIMPLEBLOBDi2015NewLine    w.Write((byte) 0x02); // Version 2Di2015NewLine    w.Write((byte) 0x00); // ReservedDi2015NewLine    w.Write((byte) 0x00); // ReservedDi2015NewLine    if(key is Rijndael){Di2015NewLine      w.Write(0x00006611);  // ALG_ID for the encrypted key.Di2015NewLine    }else if (key is TripleDES && key.KeySizeValue == 192){Di2015NewLine      w.Write(0x00006603);  // ALG_ID for the encrypted key.Di2015NewLine    }else{Di2015NewLine      throw new NotSupportedException("Look the value up on http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/aa375549%28VS.85%29.aspx");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    w.Write(0x0000a400);  // CALG_RSA_KEYXDi2015NewLine    byte[] encryptedKey = publicKey.Encrypt(key.Key);Di2015NewLine    byte[] reversedEncryptedKey = new byte[encryptedKey.Length];Di2015NewLine    for(int i=0;i<encryptedKey.Length;i++){Di2015NewLine      reversedEncryptedKey[i] = encryptedKey[encryptedKey.Length - 1 - i];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    w.Write(reversedEncryptedKey); // encrypted key in LSB byte orderDi2015NewLine    w.Flush();Di2015NewLine    return ms.ToArray();Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

691895Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static TSource ElementAt<TSource>(this IEnumerable<TSource> source, int index)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    TSource current;Di2015NewLine    if (source == null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw Error.ArgumentNull("source");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    IList<TSource> list = source as IList<TSource>;Di2015NewLine    if (list != null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return list[index];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (index < 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw Error.ArgumentOutOfRange("index");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    using (IEnumerator<TSource> enumerator = source.GetEnumerator())Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    Label_0036:Di2015NewLine        if (!enumerator.MoveNext())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw Error.ArgumentOutOfRange("index");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (index == 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            current = enumerator.Current;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            index--;Di2015NewLine            goto Label_0036;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return current;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
