692480Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void Func_X_2(byte[] stream, int key, byte keyByte)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    stream[0] ^= (byte)(stream[0] + BitConverter.GetBytes(LoWord(key))[0]);Di2015NewLine    stream[1] ^= (byte)(stream[1] + BitConverter.GetBytes(LoWord(key))[1]);Di2015NewLine    stream[2] ^= (byte)(stream[2] + BitConverter.GetBytes(HiWord(key))[0]);Di2015NewLine    stream[3] ^= (byte)(stream[3] + BitConverter.GetBytes(HiWord(key))[1]);Di2015NewLine    stream[4] ^= (byte)(stream[4] + BitConverter.GetBytes(LoWord(key))[0]);Di2015NewLine    stream[5] ^= (byte)(stream[5] + BitConverter.GetBytes(LoWord(key))[1]);Di2015NewLine    stream[6] ^= (byte)(stream[6] + BitConverter.GetBytes(HiWord(key))[0]);Di2015NewLine    stream[7] ^= (byte)(stream[7] + BitConverter.GetBytes(HiWord(key))[1]);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static int LoWord(int dwValue)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return (dwValue & 0xFFFF);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static int HiWord(int dwValue)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return (dwValue >> 16) & 0xFFFF;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
692682Di2015UniqueSeparatorvar path = "c:/test.txt";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineFile.WriteAllText(path, "a\\nb\\r\\nc");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineusing (var stream = File.OpenRead(path))Di2015NewLineusing (var reader = new StreamReader(stream, Encoding.ASCII))Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var lineBuilder = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine    string line;Di2015NewLine    char currentChar;Di2015NewLine    int nextChar;Di2015NewLine    while (!reader.EndOfStream)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        currentChar = (char)reader.Read();Di2015NewLine        nextChar = reader.Peek();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (!(currentChar == '\\r' && nextChar == '\\n'))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            lineBuilder.Append(currentChar);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if((currentChar == '\\r' && nextChar == '\\n') || nextChar == -1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            line = lineBuilder.ToString();Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(line);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            lineBuilder = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            reader.Read();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

693741Di2015UniqueSeparatorGenerateCheckByte
693741Di2015UniqueSeparatorunsafe
693741Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static unsafe byte GenerateCheckByte(byte[] packet, int length, UInt32 seed )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (packet == null)Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentNullException("packet"); // the right way in C#Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    UInt32 checksum = 0xFFFFFFFF;Di2015NewLine    length &= 0x7FFF;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    UInt32 moddedseed = seed << 8;Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < length; i++)Di2015NewLine        checksum = ( checksum >> 8 ) ^ Table.table[moddedseed + ( ( packet[i] ^ checksum ) & 0xFF )];Di2015NewLine    byte result = (byte)(( (checksum>>24)&0xFF ) + ( (checksum>>8)&0xFF ) + ( (checksum>>16)&0xFF ) + ( checksum&0xFF ));Di2015NewLine    return result;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

694822Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace ConsoleApplication1Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public interface IExprVisitor<t>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        t visitor);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public abstract class UnaryOp : ExprDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public Expr First { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine        public UnaryOp(Expr first)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.First = first;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public abstract class BinExpr : first, Expr second)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            this.First = first;Di2015NewLine            this.Second = second;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class TrueExpr : ExprDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public override t Accept<t>(IExprVisitor<t> visitor)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class Nand : BinExprDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public Nand(Expr first, Expr second) : base(first, second) { }Di2015NewLine public class Or : BinExprDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public Or(Expr first, Expr second) : base(first, second) { }Di2015NewLine        public override t Accept<t>(IExprVisitor<t> visitor)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return visitor.Visit(this);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class Xor : BinExprDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public Xor(Expr first, Expr second) : base(first, second) { }Di2015NewLine        public override t Accept<t>(IExprVisitor<t> visitor)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return visitor.Visit(this);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class Not : UnaryOpDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public Not(Expr first) : base(first) { }Di2015NewLine        public override t Accept<t>(IExprVisitor<t> visitor)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return visitor.Visit(this);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class EvalVisitor : IExprVisitor<bool>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public bool Visit(TrueExpr expr)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public bool Visit(And expr)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return Eval(expr.First) && Eval(expr.Second);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public bool Visit(Nand expr)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return !(Eval(expr.First) && Eval(expr.Second));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public bool Visit(Or expr)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return Eval(expr.First) || Eval(expr.Second);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public bool Visit(Xor expr)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return Eval(expr.First) ^ Eval(expr.Second);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public bool Visit(Not expr)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return !Eval(expr.First);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public bool Eval(Expr expr)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return expr.Accept(this);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class PrettyPrintVisitor : IExprVisitor<string>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public string Visit(TrueExpr expr)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return "True";Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public string Visit(And expr)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return string.Format("({0}) AND ({1})", expr.First.Accept(this), expr.Second.Accept(this));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public string Visit(Nand expr)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return string.Format("({0}) NAND ({1})", expr.First.Accept(this), expr.Second.Accept(this));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public string Visit(Or expr)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return string.Format("({0}) OR ({1})", expr.First.Accept(this), expr.Second.Accept(this));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public string Visit(Xor expr)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return string.Format("({0}) XOR ({1})", expr.First.Accept(this), expr.Second.Accept(this));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public string Visit(Not expr)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return string.Format("Not ({0})", expr.First.Accept(this));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public string Pretty(Expr expr)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return expr.Accept(this).Replace("(True)", "True");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static void TestLogicalEquivalence(Expr first, Expr second)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var prettyPrinter = new PrettyPrintVisitor();Di2015NewLine            var eval = new EvalVisitor();Di2015NewLine            var evalFirst = eval.Eval(first);Di2015NewLine            var evalSecond = eval.Eval(second);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Testing expressions:");Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("    First  = {0}", prettyPrinter.Pretty(first));Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("        Eval(First):  {0}", evalFirst);Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("    Second = {0}", prettyPrinter.Pretty(second));Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("        Eval(Second): {0}", evalSecond);;Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("    Equivalent? {0}", evalFirst == evalSecond);Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var P = new TrueExpr();Di2015NewLine            var Q = new Not(new TrueExpr());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            TestLogicalEquivalence(P, Q);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            TestLogicalEquivalence(Di2015NewLine                new Not(P),Di2015NewLine                new Nand(P, P));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            TestLogicalEquivalence(Di2015NewLine                new And(P, Q),Di2015NewLine                new Nand(new Nand(P, Q), new Nand(P, Q)));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            TestLogicalEquivalence(Di2015NewLine                new Or(P, Q),Di2015NewLine                new Nand(new Nand(P, P), new Nand(Q, Q)));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            TestLogicalEquivalence(Di2015NewLine                new Xor(P, Q),Di2015NewLine                new Nand(Di2015NewLine                    new Nand(P, new Nand(P, Q)),Di2015NewLine                    new Nand(Q, new Nand(P, Q)))Di2015NewLine                );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.ReadKey(true);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
694822Di2015UniqueSeparator#lightDi2015NewLineopen SystemDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinetype expr =Di2015NewLine    | TrueDi2015NewLine    | And of expr * exprDi2015NewLine    | Nand of expr * exprDi2015NewLine    | Or of expr * exprDi2015NewLine    | Xor of expr * exprDi2015NewLine    | Not of exprDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinelet (^^) p q = not(p && q) && (p || q) // makeshift xor operatorDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinelet rec eval = functionDi2015NewLine    | True          -> trueDi2015NewLine    | And(e1, e2)   -> eval(e1) && eval(e2)Di2015NewLine    | Nand(e1, e2)  -> not(eval(e1) && eval(e2))Di2015NewLine    | Or(e1, e2)    -> eval(e1) || eval(e2)Di2015NewLine    | Xor(e1, e2)   -> eval(e1) ^^ eval(e2)Di2015NewLine    | Not(e1)       -> not(eval(e1))Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinelet rec prettyPrint e =Di2015NewLine    let rec loop = functionDi2015NewLine        | True          -> "True"Di2015NewLine        | And(e1, e2)   -> sprintf "(%s) AND (%s)" (loop e1) (loop e2)Di2015NewLine        | Nand(e1, e2)  -> sprintf "(%s) NAND (%s)" (loop e1) (loop e2)Di2015NewLine        | Or(e1, e2)    -> sprintf "(%s) OR (%s)" (loop e1) (loop e2)Di2015NewLine        | Xor(e1, e2)   -> sprintf "(%s) XOR (%s)" (loop e1) (loop e2)Di2015NewLine        | Not(e1)       -> sprintf "NOT (%s)" (loop e1)Di2015NewLine    (loop e).Replace("(True)", "True")Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinelet testLogicalEquivalence e1 e2 =Di2015NewLine    let eval1, eval2 = eval e1, eval e2Di2015NewLine    printfn "Testing expressions:"Di2015NewLine    printfn "    First  = %s" (prettyPrint e1)Di2015NewLine    printfn "        eval(e1): %b" eval1Di2015NewLine    printfn "    Second = %s" (prettyPrint e2)Di2015NewLine    printfn "        eval(e2): %b" eval2Di2015NewLine    printfn "    Equilalent? %b" (eval1 = eval2)Di2015NewLine    printfn ""Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinelet p, q = True, Not TrueDi2015NewLinelet tests =Di2015NewLine    [Di2015NewLine        p, q;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Not(p), Nand(p, p);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        And(p, q),Di2015NewLine            Nand(Nand(p, q), Nand(p, q));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Or(p, q),Di2015NewLine            Nand(Nand(p, p), Nand(q, q));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Xor(p, q),Di2015NewLine            Nand(Di2015NewLine                    Nand(p, Nand(p, q)),Di2015NewLine                    Nand(q, Nand(p, q))Di2015NewLine                )Di2015NewLine    ]Di2015NewLinetests |> Seq.iter (fun (e1, e2) -> testLogicalEquivalence e1 e2)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineConsole.WriteLine("(press any key)")Di2015NewLineConsole.ReadKey(true) |> ignoreDi2015NewLine
694822Di2015UniqueSeparatorlet rec simplify = functionDi2015NewLine    | Nand(p, q) when p = q -> Not(simplify p)Di2015NewLine    | Nand(Nand(p1, q1), Nand(p2, q2))Di2015NewLine        when equivalent [p1; p2] && equivalent [q1; q2]Di2015NewLine                    -> And(simplify p1, simplify q1)Di2015NewLine    | Nand(Nand(p1, p2), Nand(q1, q2))Di2015NewLine        when equivalent [p1; p2] && equivalent [q1; q2]Di2015NewLine                    -> Or(simplify p1, simplify q1)Di2015NewLine    | Nand(Nand(p1, Nand(p2, q1)), Nand(q2, Nand(p3, q3)))Di2015NewLine        when equivalent [p1; p2; p3] && equivalent [q1; q2; q3]Di2015NewLine                    -> Xor(simplify p1, simplify q1)Di2015NewLine    | Nand(p, q) -> Nand(simplify p, simplify q)Di2015NewLine    | True          -> TrueDi2015NewLine    | And(p, q)     -> And(simplify p, simplify q)Di2015NewLine    | Or(p, q)      -> Or(simplify p, simplify q)Di2015NewLine    | Xor(p, q)     -> Xor(simplify p, simplify q)Di2015NewLine    | Not(Not p)    -> simplify pDi2015NewLine    | Not(p)        -> Not(simplify p)Di2015NewLine

694915Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Escapes the LDAP search filter to prevent LDAP injection attacks.Di2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="searchFilter">The search filter.</param>Di2015NewLine/// <see cref="https://blogs.oracle.com/shankar/entry/what_is_ldap_injection" />Di2015NewLine/// <see cref="http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/aa746475.aspx" />Di2015NewLine/// <returns>The escaped search filter.</returns>Di2015NewLineprivate static string EscapeLdapSearchFilter(string searchFilter)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    StringBuilder escape = new StringBuilder(); // If using JDK >= 1.5 consider using StringBuilderDi2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < searchFilter.Length; ++i)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        char current = searchFilter[i];Di2015NewLine        switch (current)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case '\\\\':Di2015NewLine                escape.Append(@"\\5c");Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case '*':Di2015NewLine                escape.Append(@"\\2a");Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case '(':Di2015NewLine                escape.Append(@"\\28");Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case ')':Di2015NewLine                escape.Append(@"\\29");Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case '\\u0000':Di2015NewLine                escape.Append(@"\\00");Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            case '/':Di2015NewLine                escape.Append(@"\\2f");Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            default:Di2015NewLine                escape.Append(current);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return escape.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

701515Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static List<Square> GetGroup(int match, Model grid, Square leader)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Stack<Square> curStack = new Stack<Square>(); Di2015NewLine        Dictionary<Square, bool> Retval = new Dictionary<Square, bool>(); Di2015NewLine        curStack.Push(leader);Di2015NewLine        Retval.Add(leader, true);Di2015NewLine        int numMatch = 1;Di2015NewLine        while (curStack.Count != 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Square curItem = curStack.Pop(); Di2015NewLine            foreach (Square s in curItem.Neighbors) Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (Retval.ContainsKey(curItem))Di2015NewLine                    continue;Di2015NewLine                if (0 != ((int)(s.RoomType) & match))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    curStack.Push(s);Di2015NewLine                    Retval.Add(s, true);Di2015NewLine                    ++numMatch;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Retval.Add(s, false);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // LINQ makes this easier, but since you're using .NET 2.0...Di2015NewLine        List<Square> matches = new List<Square>(numMatch);Di2015NewLine        foreach (KeyValuePair<Square, bool> kvp in Retval)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (kvp.Value == true)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                matches.Add(kvp.Key);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return matches;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

703292Di2015UniqueSeparatorstring GetRelativePath(string filespec, string folder)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Uri pathUri = new Uri(filespec);Di2015NewLine    // Folders must end in a slashDi2015NewLine    if (!folder.EndsWith(Path.DirectorySeparatorChar.ToString()))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        folder += Path.DirectorySeparatorChar;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    Uri folderUri = new Uri(folder);Di2015NewLine    return Uri.UnescapeDataString(folderUri.MakeRelativeUri(pathUri).ToString().Replace('/', Path.DirectorySeparatorChar));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

703604Di2015UniqueSeparator /^[-0-9a-z._~]*$/Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine ^       :: matches the start of a string/start of a lineDi2015NewLine [       :: start of a character class, means match any one of the contained charactersDi2015NewLine -       :: dash has a special meaning in character classes, so to avoid having it interpreted for its special meaning, list it firstDi2015NewLine 0-9     :: shorthand for 0123456789 in a character classDi2015NewLine a-z     :: shorthand for abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyz in a character classDi2015NewLine ._~     :: means exactly these characters in a character classDi2015NewLine ]       :: end of the character class Di2015NewLine *       :: match zero or more of the previous atom (in this case, the character class)Di2015NewLine $       :: matches the end of a string/end of a lineDi2015NewLine

706154Di2015UniqueSeparator    private void ReceiveCallback(IAsyncResult ar)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int bytesRead = 0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // receive finishedDi2015NewLine            if (ar.IsCompleted)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                TcpIpState stateObject =  0,Di2015NewLine                                asBuffer.Count));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    // Let the owner object know of the received messageDi2015NewLine                    base.EnqueueMessage(new TcpIpMessage(stateObject.SBuilder.ToString()));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Start a new receive operationDi2015NewLine                    stateObject.SBuilder = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine                    stateObject.Buffer.Clear();Di2015NewLine stateObject.Buffer,Di2015NewLine                        SocketFlags.None,Di2015NewLine                        new AsyncCallback(ReceiveCallback),Di2015NewLine                        stateObject);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    OnDisconnected(this, new Exception("Bytes returned are 706959Di2015UniqueSeparator sp_getapplockDi2015NewLine
706959Di2015UniqueSeparatorBEGIN TRANDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDECLARE @result intDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineEXEC @result = sp_getapplock @Resource = 'YOUR_uniqueidentifier_HERE', Di2015NewLine                             @LockMode = 'Exclusive',Di2015NewLine                             @LockTimeout = 90Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineIF @result NOT IN ( 0, 1 )   -- Only successful return codesDi2015NewLineBEGINDi2015NewLine  PRINT @resultDi2015NewLine  RAISERROR ( 'Lock failed to acquire...', 16, 1 )Di2015NewLineEND Di2015NewLineELSEDi2015NewLineBEGINDi2015NewLine    -- DO STUFF HERE Di2015NewLineENDDi2015NewLineEXEC @result = sp_releaseapplock @Resource = 'YOUR_uniqueidentifier_HERE'  Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineCOMMIT TRANDi2015NewLine
707035Di2015UniqueSeparatorDouble minAlt = 0.0;Di2015NewLineDouble maxAlt = 500000.0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineInt32 numberSteps = 1000;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDouble boundary = +6.0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinefor (Int32 step = 0; step < numberSteps; step++)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   Double t = -boundary + 2.0 * boundary * step / (numberSteps - 1);Di2015NewLine   Double correction = 1.0 / (1.0 + Math.Exp(Math.Abs(boundary)));Di2015NewLine   Double value = 1.0 / (1.0 + Math.Exp(-t));Di2015NewLine   Double correctedValue = (value - correction) / (1.0 - 2.0 * correction);Di2015NewLine   Double curAlt = correctedValue * (maxAlt - minAlt) + minAlt;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
707035Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinenamespace LogisticFunctionDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    class ProgramDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Double minAlt = 5.0;Di2015NewLine            Double maxAlt = 95.0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Int32 numberSteps = 60;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Keep maxAlt and numberSteps small if you don't want a giant console window.Di2015NewLine            Console.SetWindowSize((Int32)maxAlt + 12, numberSteps + 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Positive values produce ascending functions.Di2015NewLine            // Negative values produce descending functions.Di2015NewLine            // Values with smaller magnitude produce more linear functions.Di2015NewLine            // Values with larger magnitude produce more step like functions.Di2015NewLine            // Zero causes an error.Di2015NewLine            // Try for example +1.0, +6.0, +20.0 and -1.0, -6.0, -20.0Di2015NewLine            Double boundary = +6.0;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            for (Int32 step = 0; step < numberSteps; step++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Double t = -boundary + 2.0 * boundary * step / (numberSteps - 1);Di2015NewLine                Double correction = 1.0 / (1.0 + Math.Exp(Math.Abs(boundary)));Di2015NewLine                Double value = 1.0 / (1.0 + Math.Exp(-t));Di2015NewLine                Double correctedValue = (value - correction) / (1.0 - 2.0 * correction);Di2015NewLine                Double curAlt = correctedValue * (maxAlt - minAlt) + minAlt;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine(String.Format("{0, 10:N4} {1}", curAlt, new String('#', (Int32)Math.Round(curAlt))));Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

710969Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class ControlColorAnimatorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private const int INTERVAL = 100;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private readonly decimal _alphaIncrement;Di2015NewLine    private readonly decimal _blueIncrement;Di2015NewLine    private readonly Color _endColor;Di2015NewLine    private readonly decimal _greenIncrement;Di2015NewLine    private readonly int _iterations;Di2015NewLine    private readonly decimal _redIncrement;Di2015NewLine    private readonly Color _startColor;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private decimal _currentAlpha;Di2015NewLine    private decimal _currentBlueValue;Di2015NewLine    private decimal _currentGreenValue;Di2015NewLine    private decimal _currentRedValue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private Timer _timer;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ControlColorAnimator(TimeSpan duration, Color startColor, Color endColor)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _startColor = startColor;Di2015NewLine        _endColor = endColor;Di2015NewLine        resetColor();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _iterations = duration.Milliseconds / INTERVAL;Di2015NewLine        _alphaIncrement = ((decimal) startColor.A - endColor.A) / _iterations;Di2015NewLine        _redIncrement = ((decimal) startColor.R - endColor.R) / _iterations;Di2015NewLine        _greenIncrement = ((decimal) startColor.G - endColor.G) / _iterations;Di2015NewLine        _blueIncrement = ((decimal) startColor.B - endColor.B) / _iterations;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Color CurrentColorDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int alpha = Convert.ToInt32(_currentAlpha);Di2015NewLine            int red = Convert.ToInt32(_currentRedValue);Di2015NewLine            int green = Convert.ToInt32(_currentGreenValue);Di2015NewLine            int blue = Convert.ToInt32(_currentBlueValue);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return Color.FromArgb(alpha, red, green, blue);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public event EventHandler<DataEventArgs<Color>> ColorChanged;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Go()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        disposeOfTheTimer();Di2015NewLine        OnColorChanged(_startColor);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        resetColor();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        int currentIteration = 0;Di2015NewLine        _timer = new Timer(delegateDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (currentIteration++ >= _iterations)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Stop();Di2015NewLine                    return;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                _currentAlpha -= _alphaIncrement;Di2015NewLine                _currentRedValue -= _redIncrement;Di2015NewLine                _currentGreenValue -= _greenIncrement;Di2015NewLine                _currentBlueValue -= _blueIncrement;Di2015NewLine                OnColorChanged(CurrentColor);Di2015NewLine            }, null, TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(INTERVAL), TimeSpan.FromMilliseconds(INTERVAL));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Stop()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        disposeOfTheTimer();Di2015NewLine        OnColorChanged(_endColor);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected virtual void OnColorChanged(Color color)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (ColorChanged == null) return;Di2015NewLine        ColorChanged(this, color);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void disposeOfTheTimer()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Timer timer = _timer;Di2015NewLine        _timer = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (timer != null) timer.Dispose();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void resetColor()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _currentAlpha = _startColor.A;Di2015NewLine        _currentRedValue = _startColor.R;Di2015NewLine        _currentGreenValue = _startColor.G;Di2015NewLine        _currentBlueValue = _startColor.B;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

715388Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static T RawStructureRead<T>(Stream stream) where T : structDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  T @struct;Di2015NewLine  int size = Marshal.SizeOf(typeof(T));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  BinaryReader reader = new BinaryReader(stream);Di2015NewLine  byte[] buffer = reader.ReadBytes(size);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  GCHandle handle = GCHandle.Alloc(buffer, GCHandleType.Pinned);Di2015NewLine  @struct = (T)Marshal.PtrToStructure(handle.AddrOfPinnedObject(), typeof(T));Di2015NewLine  handle.Free();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  return @struct;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

715658Di2015UniqueSeparatorbool DoOrTimeout<T>(T method, TimeSpan timeout) where T : delegate // FIXMEDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    bool stopTrying = false;Di2015NewLine    DateTime time = DateTime.Now;Di2015NewLine    while (!stopTrying)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            method.Invoke();Di2015NewLine            stopTrying = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (DateTime.Now.Subtract(time).Milliseconds > timeout.TotalMilliseconds)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                stopTrying = true;Di2015NewLine                throw;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

716647Di2015UniqueSeparator// Helper class for constructionDi2015NewLinepublic static class ProjectionEqualityComparerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static ProjectionEqualityComparer<TSource, TKey>Di2015NewLine        Create<TSource, TKey>(Func<TSource, TKey> projection)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new ProjectionEqualityComparer<TSource, TKey>(projection);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static ProjectionEqualityComparer<TSource, TKey>Di2015NewLine        Create<TSource, TKey> (TSource ignored,Di2015NewLine                               Func<TSource, TKey> projection)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new ProjectionEqualityComparer<TSource, TKey>(projection);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static class ProjectionEqualityComparer<TSource>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static ProjectionEqualityComparer<TSource, TKey>Di2015NewLine        Create<TKey>(Func<TSource, TKey> projection)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return new ProjectionEqualityComparer<TSource, TKey>(projection);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class ProjectionEqualityComparer<TSource, TKey>Di2015NewLine    : IEqualityComparer<TSource>Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    readonly Func<TSource, TKey> projection;Di2015NewLine    readonly IEqualityComparer<TKey> comparer;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ProjectionEqualityComparer(Func<TSource, TKey> projection)Di2015NewLine        : this(projection, null)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ProjectionEqualityComparer(Di2015NewLine        Func<TSource, TKey> projection,Di2015NewLine        IEqualityComparer<TKey> comparer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        projection.ThrowIfNull("projection");Di2015NewLine        this.comparer = comparer ?? EqualityComparer<TKey>.Default;Di2015NewLine        this.projection = projection;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool Equals(TSource x, TSource y)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (x == null && y == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (x == null || y == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return comparer.Equals(projection(x), projection(y));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int GetHashCode(TSource obj)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (obj == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException("obj");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return comparer.GetHashCode(projection(obj));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
716647Di2015UniqueSeparatorDistinctBy
716647Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static IEnumerable<TSource> DistinctBy<TSource, TKey>Di2015NewLine        (this IEnumerable<TSource> source,Di2015NewLine         Func<TSource, TKey> keySelector)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return source.DistinctBy(keySelector, null);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<TSource> DistinctBy<TSource, TKey>Di2015NewLine        (this IEnumerable<TSource> source,Di2015NewLine         Func<TSource, TKey> keySelector,Di2015NewLine         IEqualityComparer<TKey> comparer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        source.ThrowIfNull("source");Di2015NewLine        keySelector.ThrowIfNull("keySelector");Di2015NewLine        return DistinctByImpl(source, keySelector, comparer);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static IEnumerable<TSource> DistinctByImpl<TSource, TKey>Di2015NewLine        (IEnumerable<TSource> source,Di2015NewLine         Func<TSource, TKey> keySelector,Di2015NewLine         IEqualityComparer<TKey> comparer)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        HashSet<TKey> knownKeys = new HashSet<TKey>(comparer);Di2015NewLine        foreach (TSource element in source)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (knownKeys.Add(keySelector(element)))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                yield return element;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

719062Di2015UniqueSeparatorw.Write((byte) 0x00); // Reserved
719062Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic byte[] GetRC4SessionBlobFromKey(byte[] keyData, RSACryptoServiceProvider publicKey)        Di2015NewLine{              Di2015NewLine  using(MemoryStream ms = new MemoryStream())              Di2015NewLine  using(BinaryWriter w = new BinaryWriter(ms))            Di2015NewLine  {                   Di2015NewLine    w.Write((byte) 0x01); // SIMPLEBLOB                    Di2015NewLine    w.Write((byte) 0x02); // Version 2                    Di2015NewLine    w.Write((byte) 0x00); // Reserved                    Di2015NewLine    w.Write((byte) 0x00); // Reserved                    Di2015NewLine    w.Write(0x00006801);  // ALG_ID = RC4 for the encrypted key.                Di2015NewLine    w.Write(0x0000a400);  // CALG_RSA_KEYX                    Di2015NewLine    byte[] encryptedKey = publicKey.Encrypt(key.Key);Di2015NewLine    byte[] reversedEncryptedKey = new byte[encryptedKey.Length];Di2015NewLine    for(int i=0;i<encryptedKey.Length;i++){Di2015NewLine      reversedEncryptedKey[i] = encryptedKey[encryptedKey.Length - 1 - i];Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    w.Write(reversedEncryptedKey); // encrypted key in LSB byte orderDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    w.Flush();                Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return ms.ToArray();              Di2015NewLine  }        Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

722915Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class PermutationGeneratorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private static class Permutation<T>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public static IEnumerable<T> Choices { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static PermutationGenerator()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Permutation<int>.Choices = new List<int> { -1, 0, 1 }.AsReadOnly();Di2015NewLine        Permutation<string>.Choices = new List<string> { null, "", "Hello World" }.AsReadOnly();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static IEnumerable<T> GetPermutations<T>()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (Permutation<T>.Choices == null) {Di2015NewLine            var props = typeof(T).GetProperties().Where(p => p.CanWrite);Di2015NewLine            Permutation<T>.Choices = new List<T>(GeneratePermutations<T>(() => Activator.CreateInstance<T>(), props)).AsReadOnly();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return Permutation<T>.Choices;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static IEnumerable GetPermutations(Type t) {Di2015NewLine        var method = typeof(PermutationGenerator).GetMethod("GetPermutations", new Type[] {}).MakeGenericMethod(t);Di2015NewLine        return (IEnumerable)(method.Invoke(null,new object[] {}));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private delegate T Generator<T>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private static IEnumerable<T> GeneratePermutations<T>(Generator<T> generator, IEnumerable<PropertyInfo> props)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!props.Any())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return generator();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            var prop = props.First();Di2015NewLine            var rest = props.Skip(1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (var propVal in GetPermutations(prop.PropertyType))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Generator<T> gen = () =>Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    var obj = generator();Di2015NewLine                    prop.SetValue(obj, propVal, null);Di2015NewLine                    return (T)obj;Di2015NewLine                };Di2015NewLine                foreach (var result in GeneratePermutations(gen, rest))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    yield return result;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

set; }Di2015NewLine    public Vector2 ScreenCenter { get; protected set; }Di2015NewLine    public Matrix Transform { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public IFocusable Focus { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    public float MoveSpeed { get; set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Called when the GameComponent needs to be initialized. Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public override void Initialize()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _viewportWidth = Game.GraphicsDevice.Viewport.Width;Di2015NewLine        _viewportHeight = Game.GraphicsDevice.Viewport.Height;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        ScreenCenter = new Vector2(_viewportWidth/2, _viewportHeight/2);Di2015NewLine        Scale = 1;Di2015NewLine        MoveSpeed = 1.25f;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        base.Initialize();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public override void Update(GameTime gameTime)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Create the Transform used by anyDi2015NewLine        // spritebatch processDi2015NewLine        Transform = Matrix.Identity*Di2015NewLine                    Matrix.CreateTranslation(-Position.X, -Position.Y, 0)*Di2015NewLine                    Matrix.CreateRotationZ(Rotation)*Di2015NewLine                    Matrix.CreateTranslation(Origin.X, Origin.Y, 0)*Di2015NewLine                    Matrix.CreateScale(new Vector3(Scale, Scale, Scale));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Origin = ScreenCenter / Scale;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Move the Camera to the position that it needs to goDi2015NewLine        var delta = (float) gameTime.ElapsedGameTime.TotalSeconds;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        _position.X += (Focus.Position.X - Position.X) * MoveSpeed * delta;Di2015NewLine        _position.Y += (Focus.Position.Y - Position.Y) * MoveSpeed * delta;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        base.Update(gameTime);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Determines whether the target is in view given the specified position.Di2015NewLine    /// This can be used to increase performance by not drawing objectsDi2015NewLine    /// directly in the viewportDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="position">The position.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="texture">The texture.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>Di2015NewLine    ///     <c>true</c> if [is in view] [the specified position]; otherwise, <c>false</c>.Di2015NewLine    /// </returns>Di2015NewLine    public bool IsInView(Vector2 position, Texture2D texture)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // If the object is not within the horizontal bounds of the screenDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if ( (position.X + texture.Width) < (Position.X - Origin.X) || (position.X) > (Position.X + Origin.X) )Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // If the object is not within the vertical bounds of the screenDi2015NewLine        if ((position.Y + texture.Height) < (Position.Y - Origin.Y) || (position.Y) > (Position.Y + Origin.Y))Di2015NewLine            return false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // In ViewDi2015NewLine        return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

724184Di2015UniqueSeparator    static List<Info> RecursiveScan2(string directory) {Di2015NewLine        IntPtr INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE = new IntPtr(-1);Di2015NewLine        WIN32_FIND_DATAW findData;Di2015NewLine        IntPtr findHandle = INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var info = new List<Info>();Di2015NewLine        try {Di2015NewLine            findHandle = FindFirstFileW(directory + @"\\*", out findData);Di2015NewLine            if (findHandle != INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                do {Di2015NewLine                    if (findData.cFileName == "." || findData.cFileName == "..") continue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    string fullpath = directory + (directory.EndsWith("\\\\") ? "" : "\\\\") + findData.cFileName;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    bool isDir = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if ((findData.dwFileAttributes & FileAttributes.Directory) != 0) {Di2015NewLine                        isDir = true;Di2015NewLine                        info.AddRange(RecursiveScan2(fullpath));Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    info.Add(new Info()Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        CreatedDate = findData.ftCreationTime.ToDateTime(),Di2015NewLine                        ModifiedDate = findData.ftLastWriteTime.ToDateTime(),Di2015NewLine                        IsDirectory = isDir,Di2015NewLine                        Path = fullpathDi2015NewLine                    });Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                while (FindNextFile(findHandle, out findData));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        } finally {Di2015NewLine            if (findHandle != INVALID_HANDLE_VALUE) FindClose(findHandle);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return info;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine
724184Di2015UniqueSeparator public static class FILETIMEExtensions {Di2015NewLine        public static DateTime ToDateTime(this System.Runtime.InteropServices.ComTypes.FILETIME filetime ) {Di2015NewLine            long highBits = filetime.dwHighDateTime;Di2015NewLine            highBits = highBits << 32;Di2015NewLine            return DateTime.FromFileTimeUtc(highBits + (long)filetime.dwLowDateTime);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

724427Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Reflection;Di2015NewLineclass FooDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string Bar { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        PropertyInfo prop = typeof(Foo).GetProperty("Bar");Di2015NewLine        Foo foo = new Foo();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // create an open "getter" delegateDi2015NewLine        Func<Foo, string> getForAnyFoo = (Func<Foo, string>)Di2015NewLine            Delegate.CreateDelegate(typeof(Func<Foo, string>), null,Di2015NewLine                prop.GetGetMethod());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Func<string> getForFixedFoo = (Func<string>)Di2015NewLine            Delegate.CreateDelegate(typeof(Func<string>), foo,Di2015NewLine                prop.GetGetMethod());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Action<Foo,string> setForAnyFoo = (Action<Foo,string>)Di2015NewLine            Delegate.CreateDelegate(typeof(Action<Foo, string>), null,Di2015NewLine                prop.GetSetMethod());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Action<string> setForFixedFoo = (Action<string>)Di2015NewLine            Delegate.CreateDelegate(typeof(Action<string>), foo,Di2015NewLine                prop.GetSetMethod());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        setForAnyFoo(foo, "abc");Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(getForAnyFoo(foo));Di2015NewLine        setForFixedFoo("def");Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(getForFixedFoo());Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
724490Di2015UniqueSeparatorUniqueBy
724490Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<T> OnlyUnique<T>(this IEnumerable<T> source)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // No error checking :)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    HashSet<T> toReturn = new HashSet<T>();Di2015NewLine    HashSet<T> seen = new HashSet<T>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (T element in source)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (seen.Add(element))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            toReturn.Add(element);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            toReturn.Remove(element);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    // yield to get deferred executionDi2015NewLine    foreach (T element in toReturn)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        yield return element;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
724490Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<TElement> UniqueBy<TElement, TKey>Di2015NewLine    (this IEnumerable<TElement> source,Di2015NewLine     Func<TElement, TKey> keySelector)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    var results = new LinkedList<TElement>();Di2015NewLine    // If we've seen a key 0 times, it won't be in here.Di2015NewLine    // If we've seen it once, it will be in as a node.Di2015NewLine    // If we've seen it more than once, it will be in as null.Di2015NewLine    var nodeMap = new Dictionary<TKey, LinkedListNode<TElement>>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (TElement element in source)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        TKey key = keySelector(element);Di2015NewLine        LinkedListNode<TElement> currentNode;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (nodeMap.TryGetValue(key, out currentNode))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Seen it before. Remove if non-nullDi2015NewLine            if (currentNode != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                results.Remove(currentNode);Di2015NewLine                nodeMap[key] = null;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            // Otherwise no action neededDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            LinkedListNode<TElement> node = results.AddLast(element);Di2015NewLine            nodeMap[key] = node;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    foreach (TElement element in results)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        yield return element;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

726272Di2015UniqueSeparatorpartial class UserDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public string FirstNameDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    \get { return (string)this.getExtendedProperty("FirstName").Value; }Di2015NewLine    \set { this.getExtendedProperty("FirstName").Value = value; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public string LastNameDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    \get { return (string)this.getExtendedProperty("LastName").Value; }Di2015NewLine    \set { this.getExtendedProperty("LastName").Value = value; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Grab a related property out of the collection, any changes to it will be reflected in the database after a submitDi2015NewLine    private ExtendedProperty getExtendedProperty(string KeyName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    \// grab the properties that fit the critereaDi2015NewLine    \var properties = (from prop in this.ExtendedProperties where prop.KeyName == KeyName select prop);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    \// return valueDi2015NewLine    \ExtendedProperty property = properties.SingleOrDefault();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    \// if this is a new user then there arent going to be any properties that matchDi2015NewLine    \if (property == null)Di2015NewLine    \{Di2015NewLine    \\// Define a new item to add to the collectionDi2015NewLine    \\property = new ExtendedProperty()Di2015NewLine    \\{Di2015NewLine    \\\ItemID = this.UserID,Di2015NewLine    \\\KeyName = KeyName,Di2015NewLine    \\\Value = String.EmptyDi2015NewLine    \\};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    \\// Add the item we're about to return to the collectionDi2015NewLine    \\this.ExtendedProperties.Add(property);Di2015NewLine    \}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    \// either way we have a valid property to return at this pointDi2015NewLine    \return property;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

728638Di2015UniqueSeparator    public class NodeDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public string GetIntrinsicProperty(String propertyKey)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //sets the original type valueDi2015NewLine            Type currType = this.GetType();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Node thisNode = this;Di2015NewLine            String propertyValue;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            while (currType.IsSubclassOf(typeof(Node)))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                MethodInfo mi = currType.GetMethod("GetIntrinsicProperty",BindingFlags.Instance | BindingFlags.Public,null,new Type[] {typeof(string)},null);Di2015NewLine                if (mi.DeclaringType != typeof(Node))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    propertyValue = (string)mi.Invoke(this, new object[] { propertyKey });Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (propertyValue != null)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        return propertyValue;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                //sets CurrType to its base typeDi2015NewLine                currType = currType.BaseType;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class OtherNode : NodeDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        new public string GetIntrinsicProperty(string propertyKey)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return "OtherNode says Hi!";Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class TestNode : NodeDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

729316Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Linq.Expressions;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass TestDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    // This is the method you want, I thinkDi2015NewLine    static Expression<Func<TInput,object>> AddBox<TInput, TOutput>Di2015NewLine        (Expression<Func<TInput, TOutput>> expression)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Add the boxing operation, but get a weakly typed expressionDi2015NewLine        Expression converted = Expression.ConvertDi2015NewLine             (expression.Body, typeof(object));Di2015NewLine        // Use Expression.Lambda to get back to strong typingDi2015NewLine        return Expression.Lambda<Func<TInput,object>>Di2015NewLine             (converted, expression.Parameters);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Just a simple demoDi2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Expression<Func<string, DateTime>> x = text => DateTime.Now;Di2015NewLine        var y = AddBox(x);        Di2015NewLine        object dt = y.Compile()("hi");Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(dt);Di2015NewLine    }        Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

730074Di2015UniqueSeparatorExpression.OrElse
730074Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IQueryable<TSource> WhereTrueForAny<TSource, TValue>(Di2015NewLine    this IQueryable<TSource> source,Di2015NewLine    Func<TValue, Expression<Func<TSource, bool>>> selector,Di2015NewLine    params TValue[] values)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return source.Where(BuildTrueForAny(selector, values));Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLinepublic static Expression<Func<TSource, bool>> BuildTrueForAny<TSource, TValue>(Di2015NewLine    Func<TValue, Expression<Func<TSource, bool>>> selector,Di2015NewLine    params TValue[] values)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (selector == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("selector");Di2015NewLine    if (values == null) throw new ArgumentNullException("values");Di2015NewLine    // if there are no filters, return nothingDi2015NewLine    if (values.Length == 0) return x => false;Di2015NewLine    // if there is 1 filter, use it directlyDi2015NewLine    if (values.Length == 1) return selector(values[0]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    var param = Expression.Parameter(typeof(TSource), "x");Di2015NewLine    // start with the first filterDi2015NewLine    Expression body = Expression.Invoke(selector(values[0]), param);Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 1; i < values.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine    { // for 2nd, 3rd, etc - use OrElse for that filterDi2015NewLine        body = Expression.OrElse(body,Di2015NewLine            Expression.Invoke(selector(values[i]), param));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return Expression.Lambda<Func<TSource, bool>>(body, param);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

730629Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass Base { }Di2015NewLineclass Derived : Base { }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass FooDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    void Test()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Base a = new Base();Di2015NewLine        Overload(a);    // prints "base"Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Derived b = new Derived();Di2015NewLine        Overload(b);    // prints "derived"Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // dispatched based on c's declared type!Di2015NewLine        Base c = new Derived();Di2015NewLine        Overload(c);    // prints "base"Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void Overload(Base obj)    { Console.WriteLine("base"); }Di2015NewLine    void Overload(Derived obj) { Console.WriteLine("derived"); }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
730629Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass BaseDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public virtual void Override() { Console.WriteLine("base"); }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass Derived : BaseDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public override void Override() { Console.WriteLine("derived"); }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass FooDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    void Test()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Base a = new Base();Di2015NewLine        a.Override();   // prints "base"Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Derived b = new Derived();Di2015NewLine        b.Override();    // prints "derived"Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // dynamically dispatched based type of object stored in c!Di2015NewLine        Base c = new Derived();Di2015NewLine        c.Override();    // prints "derived"Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void Overload(Base obj) { Console.WriteLine("base"); }Di2015NewLine    void Overload(Derived obj) { Console.WriteLine("derived"); }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

731330Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass BlurDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private static int count = 0;Di2015NewLine        private static Queue<int> deletions = new Queue<int>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private string _name;Di2015NewLine        public string NameDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return _name; }Di2015NewLine            setDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _name = value;Di2015NewLine                Delete();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private int assigned;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public Blur()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (deletions.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                assigned = deletions.Dequeue();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                assigned = count++;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            _name = "Blur" + assigned.ToString();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public void Delete()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (assigned >= 0)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                deletions.Enqueue(assigned);Di2015NewLine                assigned = -1;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return ( this.FirstName.Equals(other.FirstName)Di2015NewLine                && this.LastName.Equals(other.LastName));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #region IEquatable<Person> MembersDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public virtual bool    {Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return (this.Address.EqualsIgnoringPerson(other.Address)   // Don't have Address check       #endregionDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class Address : IEquatable<Address>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        private string _streetName;Di2015NewLine        private string _city;Di2015NewLine        private string _state;Di2015NewLine        private Person _resident;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public Address(string city, string state, string null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        public virtual string CityDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            get { return _city; }Di2015NewLine            set { _city = value; other)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Per MSDN documentation, x.Equals(null) should return falseDi2015NewLine            if ((object)other == null)Di2015NewLine this.Resident.EqualsIgnoringAddress(other.Resident));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        #endregionDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public class ProgramDi2015NewLine 732226Di2015UniqueSeparator        private bool ignoreNext = false;Di2015NewLine        void HookManager_MouseMoveExt(object sender, MouseEventExtArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Should we block all mouse interactions?Di2015NewLine            if (Block) {Di2015NewLine                e.Handled = true;Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Return if we should ignore the nex, because we made a big jumpDi2015NewLine            if (ignoreNext) {Di2015NewLine                ignoreNext = false;Di2015NewLine                return;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (hasControl) Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Lock the mouse to 100,100 : 200,200 and flip back to 150,150 if out of boundsDi2015NewLine                if (e.X < 100 || e.X > 200 || e.Y < 100 || e.Y > 200) // Box leavedDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // If we leave the box, we set the position to the center Di2015NewLine                    // and set the event to handled otherwise the mouse is freeDi2015NewLine                    MouseSimulator.Position = new System.Drawing.Point(150, 150);Di2015NewLine                    e.Handled = true;Di2015NewLine                    ignoreNext = true;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // We moved fine, send the delta to the serverDi2015NewLine                // The MouseSimulator.Position change will not be visible yet.Di2015NewLine                server.MouseMove(e.DeltaX, e.DeltaY, true);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            Logger.Log(String.Format("Pos: {0} {1} Delta: {2} {3}", e.X, e.Y, e.DeltaX, e.DeltaY), LogLevel.Info);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

736993Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing System.Runtime.Serialization;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine[DataContract]Di2015NewLineclass Node {Di2015NewLine    [DataMember]Di2015NewLine    public Node AnotherNode { get; set; }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic class ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Node a = new Node(), b = new Node();Di2015NewLine        // make it a cyclic graph, to prove reference-modeDi2015NewLine        a.AnotherNode = b;Di2015NewLine        b.AnotherNode = a;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // the preserveObjectReferences argument is the interesting one here...Di2015NewLine        DataContractSerializer dcs = new DataContractSerializer(Di2015NewLine            typeof(Node), null, int.MaxValue, false, true, null);Di2015NewLine        using (MemoryStream ms = new MemoryStream())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            dcs.WriteObject(ms, a);Di2015NewLine            ms.Position = 0;Di2015NewLine            Node c = (Node) dcs.ReadObject(ms);Di2015NewLine            // so .AnotherNode.Another node should be back to "c"Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(ReferenceEquals(c, c.AnotherNode.AnotherNode));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

740859Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate const int SaltSize = 8;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static void Encrypt( FileInfo targetFile, string password )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  var keyGenerator = new Rfc2898DeriveBytes( password, SaltSize );Di2015NewLine  var rijndael = Rijndael.Create();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // BlockSize, KeySize in bit --> divide by 8Di2015NewLine  rijndael.IV = keyGenerator.GetBytes( rijndael.BlockSize / 8 );Di2015NewLine  rijndael.Key = keyGenerator.GetBytes( rijndael.KeySize / 8 );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  using( var fileStream = targetFile.Create() )Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    // write random saltDi2015NewLine    fileStream.Write( keyGenerator.Salt, 0, SaltSize );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    using( var cryptoStream = new CryptoStream( fileStream, rijndael.CreateEncryptor(), CryptoStreamMode.Write ) )Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      // write dataDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
740859Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void Decrypt( FileInfo sourceFile, string password )Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  // read saltDi2015NewLine  var fileStream = sourceFile.OpenRead();Di2015NewLine  var salt = new byte[SaltSize];Di2015NewLine  fileStream.Read( salt, 0, SaltSize );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // initialize algorithm with saltDi2015NewLine  var keyGenerator = new Rfc2898DeriveBytes( password, salt );Di2015NewLine  var rijndael = Rijndael.Create();Di2015NewLine  rijndael.IV = keyGenerator.GetBytes( rijndael.BlockSize / 8 );Di2015NewLine  rijndael.Key = keyGenerator.GetBytes( rijndael.KeySize / 8 );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  // decryptDi2015NewLine  using( var cryptoStream = new CryptoStream( fileStream, rijndael.CreateDecryptor(), CryptoStreamMode.Read ) )Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    // read dataDi2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

745026Di2015UniqueSeparator  # Caches data received from a blockDi2015NewLine  #Di2015NewLine  # The difference between this method and usual Cache.getDi2015NewLine  # is following: this method caches data and allows userDi2015NewLine  # to re-generate data when it is expired w/o runningDi2015NewLine  # data generation code more than once so dog-pile effectDi2015NewLine  # won't bring our servers downDi2015NewLine  #Di2015NewLine  def smart_get(key, ttl = nil, generation_time = 30.seconds)Di2015NewLine

745026Di2015UniqueSeparator    # Create window for data refreshDi2015NewLine    real_ttl = ttl + generation_time * 2Di2015NewLine    stale_key = "#{key}.stale"Di2015NewLine
745026Di2015UniqueSeparator#{foo}
745026Di2015UniqueSeparatorString.Format()
745026Di2015UniqueSeparator    # Try to get data from memcacheDi2015NewLine    value = get(key)Di2015NewLine    stale = get(stale_key)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    # If stale key has expired, it is time to re-generate our dataDi2015NewLine    unless staleDi2015NewLine      put(stale_key, STALE_REFRESH, generation_time) # lockDi2015NewLine      value = nil # force data re-generationDi2015NewLine    endDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    # If no data retrieved or data re-generation forced, re-generate data and reset stale keyDi2015NewLine    unless valueDi2015NewLine      value = yieldDi2015NewLine      put(key, value, real_ttl)Di2015NewLine      put(stale_key, STALE_CREATED, ttl) # unlockDi2015NewLine    endDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return valueDi2015NewLine  endDi2015NewLineendDi2015NewLine
745026Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class Cache<Tkey, Tvalue> {Di2015NewLine    static const enum Stale { Refresh, Created };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /* Caches data received from a delegateDi2015NewLine     *Di2015NewLine     * The difference between this method and usual Cache.getDi2015NewLine     * is following: this method caches data and allows userDi2015NewLine     * to re-generate data when it is expired w/o runningDi2015NewLine     * data generation code more than once so dog-pile effectDi2015NewLine     * won't bring our servers downDi2015NewLine    */Di2015NewLine    public static Tvalue SmartGet(Tkey key, TimeSpan ttl, TimeSpan generationTime, Func<Tvalue> strategy)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Create window for data refreshDi2015NewLine        var realTtl = ttl + generationTime * 2;Di2015NewLine        var staleKey = String.Format("{0}stale", key);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Try to get data from memcacheDi2015NewLine        var value = Get(key);Di2015NewLine        var stale = Get(staleKey);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // If stale key has expired, it is time to re-generate our dataDi2015NewLine        if (stale is null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Put(staleKey, Stale.Refresh, generationTime); // lockDi2015NewLine            value = null; // force data re-generationDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // If no data retrieved or data re-generation forced, re-generate data and reset stale keyDi2015NewLine        if (value is null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            value = strategy();Di2015NewLine            Put(key, value, realTtl);Di2015NewLine            Put(staleKey, Stale.Created, ttl) // unlockDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return value;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Fallback to default caching approach if no ttl givenDi2015NewLine    public static Tvalue SmartGet(Tkey key, Func<Tvalue> strategy)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return Get(key, strategy);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Simulate default argument for generationTimeDi2015NewLine    // C# 4.0 has default arguments, so this wouldn't be needed.Di2015NewLine    public static Tvalue SmartGet(Tkey key, TimeSpan ttl, Func<Tvalue> strategy)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return SmartGet(key, ttl, new TimeSpan(0, 0, 30), strategy);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // Convenience overloads to allow calling it the same way as Di2015NewLine    // in Ruby, by just passing in the timespans as integers in Di2015NewLine    // seconds.Di2015NewLine    public static Tvalue SmartGet(Tkey key, int ttl, int generationTime, Func<Tvalue> strategy)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return SmartGet(key, new TimeSpan(0, 0, ttl), new TimeSpan(0, 0, generationTime), strategy);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static Tvalue SmartGet(Tkey key, int ttl, Func<Tvalue> strategy)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return SmartGet(key, new TimeSpan(0, 0, ttl), strategy);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
745040Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic partial class Form1 : FormDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public TimeSpan TimeoutToHide { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    public DateTime LastMouseMove { get; private set; }Di2015NewLine    public bool IsHidden { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public Form1()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        InitializeComponent();Di2015NewLine        TimeoutToHide = TimeSpan.FromSeconds(5);Di2015NewLine        this.MouseMove += new MouseEventHandler(Form1_MouseMove);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    void Form1_MouseMove(object sender, MouseEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        LastMouseMove = DateTime.Now;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (IsHidden) Di2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLine            Cursor.Show(); Di2015NewLine            IsHidden = false; Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void timer1_Tick(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        TimeSpan elaped = DateTime.Now - LastMouseMove;Di2015NewLine        if (elaped >= TimeoutToHide && !IsHidden)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Cursor.Hide();Di2015NewLine            IsHidden = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

747971Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Performs a binary search on a specified EventLogEntryCollection'sDi2015NewLine/// TimeWritten propertyDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="entries">The collection to search</param>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="value">The timestamp value being searched</param>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="low">The lower-bound search index</param>Di2015NewLine/// <param name="high">The upper-bound search index</param>Di2015NewLine/// <returns>The index of a matching timestamp, or -1 if not found</returns>Di2015NewLineprivate int BinarySearch(EventLogEntryCollection entries, DateTime value, int low, int high)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (high < low)Di2015NewLine    \return -1;Di2015NewLine    int mid = low + ((high - low) / 2);Di2015NewLine    if (entries[mid].TimeWritten > value)Di2015NewLine    \return BinarySearch(entries, value, low, mid - 1);Di2015NewLine    else if (entries[mid].TimeWritten < value)Di2015NewLine    \return BinarySearch(entries, value, mid + 1, high);Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    \return mid;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

749671Di2015UniqueSeparatorMyVisualTreeHelper
749671Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class MyVisualTreeHelperDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  static bool AlwaysTrue<T>(T obj) { return true; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  /// <summary>Di2015NewLine  /// Finds a parent of a given item on the visual tree. If the element is a ContentElement or FrameworkElement Di2015NewLine  /// it will use the logical tree to jump the gap.Di2015NewLine  /// If not matching item can be found, a null reference is returned.Di2015NewLine  /// </summary>Di2015NewLine  /// <typeparam name="T">The type of the element to be found</typeparam>Di2015NewLine  /// <param name="child">A direct or indirect child of the wanted item.</param>Di2015NewLine  /// <returns>The first parent item that matches the submitted type parameter. If not matching item can be found, a null reference is returned.</returns>Di2015NewLine  public static T FindParent<T>(DependencyObject child) where T : DependencyObjectDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    return FindParent<T>(child, AlwaysTrue<T>);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  public static T FindParent<T>(DependencyObject child, Predicate<T> predicate) where T : DependencyObjectDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    DependencyObject parent = GetParent(child);Di2015NewLine    if (parent == null)Di2015NewLine      return null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // check if the parent matches the type and predicate we're looking forDi2015NewLine    if ((parent is T) && (predicate((T)parent)))Di2015NewLine      return parent as T;Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine      return FindParent<T>(parent);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  static DependencyObject GetParent(DependencyObject child)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    DependencyObject parent = null;Di2015NewLine    if (child is Visual || child is Visual3D)Di2015NewLine      parent = VisualTreeHelper.GetParent(child);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // if fails to find a parent via the visual tree, try to logical tree.Di2015NewLine    return parent ?? LogicalTreeHelper.GetParent(child);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

755098Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic string Unescape(string text)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    StringBuilder builder = new StringBuilder(text.Length);Di2015NewLine    bool escaping = false;Di2015NewLine    foreach (char c in text)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (escaping)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine           // We're not handling \\uxxxx etcDi2015NewLine           escaping = false;Di2015NewLine           switch(c)Di2015NewLine           {Di2015NewLine               case 'r': builder.Append('\\r'); break;Di2015NewLine               case 'n': builder.Append('\\n'); break;Di2015NewLine               case 't': builder.Append('\\t'); break;Di2015NewLine               case '\\\\': builder.Append('\\\\'); break;Di2015NewLine               default:Di2015NewLine                   throw new ArgumentException("Unhandled escape: " + c);Di2015NewLine           }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine           if (c == '\\\\')Di2015NewLine           {Di2015NewLine               escaping = true;Di2015NewLine           }Di2015NewLine           elseDi2015NewLine           {Di2015NewLine               builder.Append(c);Di2015NewLine           }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    if (escaping)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("Unterminated escape sequence");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return builder.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

756308Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic IEnumerable<T[]> Permute<T>(this T[] xs, params T[] pre) {Di2015NewLine    if (xs.Length == 0) yield return pre;Di2015NewLine    for (int i = 0; i < xs.Length; i++) {Di2015NewLine        foreach (T[] y in Permute(xs.Take(i).Union(xs.Skip(i+1)).ToArray(), pre.Union(new[] { xs[i] }).ToArray())) {Di2015NewLine            yield return y;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

757011Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static bool IsOrdered<T>(this IEnumerable<T> source)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  var comparer = Comparer<T>.Default;Di2015NewLine  T previous = default(T);Di2015NewLine  bool first = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  foreach (T element in source)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine      if (!first && comparer.Compare(previous, element) > 0)Di2015NewLine      {Di2015NewLine          return false;Di2015NewLine      }Di2015NewLine      first = false;Di2015NewLine      previous = element;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  return true;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

763449Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Threading;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass MyAsyncResult : IAsyncResultDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    object _state;Di2015NewLine    object _lock = new object();Di2015NewLine    ManualResetEvent _doneEvent = new ManualResetEvent(false);Di2015NewLine    AsyncCallback _callback;Di2015NewLine    Exception _ex;Di2015NewLine    bool _done;Di2015NewLine    int _result;Di2015NewLine    int _x;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public MyAsyncResult(int x, AsyncCallback callback, object state)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        _callback = callback;Di2015NewLine        _state = state;Di2015NewLine        _x = x; // arbitrary argument(s)Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int X { get { return _x; } }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void SignalDone(int result)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (_lock)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _result = result;Di2015NewLine            _done = true;Di2015NewLine            _doneEvent.Set();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // never invoke any delegate while holding a lockDi2015NewLine        if (_callback != null)Di2015NewLine            _callback(this); Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void SignalException(Exception ex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (_lock)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            _ex = ex;Di2015NewLine            _done = true;Di2015NewLine            _doneEvent.Set();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (_callback != null)Di2015NewLine            _callback(this);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public object AsyncStateDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return _state; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public WaitHandle AsyncWaitHandleDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return _doneEvent; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool CompletedSynchronouslyDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return false; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public int ResultDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // lock (or volatile, complex to explain) neededDi2015NewLine        // for memory model problems.Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            lock (_lock)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (_ex != null)Di2015NewLine                    throw _ex;Di2015NewLine                return _result;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool IsCompletedDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { lock (_lock) return _done; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass ProgramDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void MyTask(object param)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MyAsyncResult ar = (MyAsyncResult) param;Di2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int x = ar.X;Di2015NewLine            Thread.Sleep(1000); // simulate lengthy workDi2015NewLine            ar.SignalDone(x * 2); // demo work = double XDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ar.SignalException(ex);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static IAsyncResult Begin(int x, AsyncCallback callback, object state)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Thread th = new Thread(MyTask);Di2015NewLine        MyAsyncResult ar = new MyAsyncResult(x, callback, state);Di2015NewLine        th.Start(ar);Di2015NewLine        return ar;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static int End(IAsyncResult ar)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        MyAsyncResult mar = (MyAsyncResult) ar;Di2015NewLine        mar.AsyncWaitHandle.WaitOne();Di2015NewLine        return mar.Result; // will throw exception if one Di2015NewLine                           // occurred in background taskDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // demo calling codeDi2015NewLine        // we don't need state or callback for demoDi2015NewLine        IAsyncResult ar = Begin(42, null, null); Di2015NewLine        int result = End(ar);Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(result);Di2015NewLine        Console.ReadLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
