838975Di2015UniqueSeparatorCREATE TABLE users (Di2015NewLine  user_id               INTEGER,Di2015NewLine  authentication_hash   BINARY,Di2015NewLine  authentication_salt   BINARY,Di2015NewLine  public_key            BINARY,Di2015NewLine  encrypted_private_key BINARY,Di2015NewLine  decryption_key_salt   BINARY,Di2015NewLine  PRIMARY KEY(user_id)Di2015NewLine)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineCREATE TABLE secrets (Di2015NewLine    secret_id INTEGER,Di2015NewLine    -- WHATEVER COLUMNS YOU REQUIRE TO ACCURATELY MODEL YOUR PASSWORDS (CLIENT INFO, ETC)Di2015NewLine    PRIMARY KEY(secret_id)Di2015NewLine)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineCREATE TABLE granted_secrets (Di2015NewLine  secret_id      INTEGER,Di2015NewLine  recipient_id   INTEGER,Di2015NewLine  encrypted_data BINARY,Di2015NewLine  PRIMARY KEY(secret_id, recipient_id),Di2015NewLine  FOREIGN KEY(secret_id) REFERENCES secrets(secret_id)Di2015NewLine  FOREIGN KEY(recipient_id) REFERENCES users(user_id)Di2015NewLine)Di2015NewLine
838975Di2015UniqueSeparatorfunction register_user(user_id, user_password) {Di2015NewLine    authentication_salt = generate_random_salt()Di2015NewLine    authentication_hash = hash(authentication_salt, user_password);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    (public_key, private_key) = asymmetric_cipher_generate_random_key_pair();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    decryption_key_salt = generate_random_salt()Di2015NewLine    decryption_key = derive_key(decryption_key_salt, user_password)Di2015NewLine    encrypted_private_key = symmetric_cipher_encrypt(Di2015NewLine        input => private_key,Di2015NewLine        key   => decryption_keyDi2015NewLine    )Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // IMPORTANT: The decryption_key_hash is never storedDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    execute("INSERT INTO users (user_id, authentication_hash, authentication_salt, public_key, encrypted_private_key, decryption_key_salt) VALUES (:user_id, :authentication_hash, :authentication_salt, :public_key, :encrypted_private_key, :decryption_key_salt)")Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
838975Di2015UniqueSeparatorfunction authenticate_user(user_id, user_password)Di2015NewLine    correct_authentication_hash = query("SELECT authentication_hash FROM users WHERE user_id = :user_id")Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    authentication_salt = query("SELECT authentication_salt FROM users WHERE user_id = :user_id")Di2015NewLine    given_authentication_hash = hash(authentication_salt, user_password)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return correct_authentication_hash == given_authentication_hashDi2015NewLine
838975Di2015UniqueSeparatorfunction grant_secret(secret_id, secret_data, recipient_id) {Di2015NewLine    recipient_public_key = query("SELECT public_key FROM users WHERE user_id = :recipient_id")Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    encrypted_secret_data = asymmetric_cipher_encrypt(Di2015NewLine        input      => secret_data,Di2015NewLine        public_key => recipient_public_keyDi2015NewLine    )Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    execute("INSERT INTO granted_secrets (secret_id, recipient_id, encrypted_data) VALUES (:secret_id, :recipient_id, :encrypted_secret_data)")Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
838975Di2015UniqueSeparatorvoid retrieve_secret(secret_id, recipient_id, recipient_password)Di2015NewLine    encrypted_recipient_private_key = query("SELECT encrypted_private_key FROM users WHERE user_id = :recipient_id")Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    recipient_decryption_key_salt = query("SELECT decryption_key_salt FROM users WHERE user_id = :recipient_id")Di2015NewLine    recipient_decryption_key = derive_key(recipient_decryption_key_salt, recipient_password)Di2015NewLine    recipient_private_key = symmetric_cipher_decrypt(Di2015NewLine        input => encrypted_recipient_private_key,Di2015NewLine        key   => recipient_decryption_keyDi2015NewLine    )Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    encrypted_secret_data = query("SELECT encrypted_data FROM granted_secrets WHERE secret_id = :secret_id AND recipient_id = :recipient_id")Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    secret_data = asymmetric_cipher_decrypt(Di2015NewLine        input       => encrypted_secret_data,Di2015NewLine        private_key => recipient_private_keyDi2015NewLine    )Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return secret_dataDi2015NewLine

845743Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System.Text.RegularExpressions;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestring[] samples = {Di2015NewLine    @"Hellotoevryone<img height=""115"" width=""150"" alt="""" src=""/Content/Edt/image/b4976875-8dfb-444c-8b32-cc b47b2d81e0.jpg"" />Iamsogladtoseeall.",Di2015NewLine    "Testing123Hello.World",Di2015NewLine    @"Test<a href=""http://stackoverflow.com"">StackOverflow</a>",Di2015NewLine    @"Blah<a href=""http://stackoverflow.com"">StackOverflow</a>Blah<a href=""http://serverfault.com"">ServerFault</a>",Di2015NewLine    @"Test<a href=""http://serverfault.com"">Server Fault</a>", // has a space, not matchedDi2015NewLine    "Stack Overflow" // has a space, not matchedDi2015NewLine};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// use these 2 lines if you don't want to use regex commentsDi2015NewLine//string pattern = @"^((?:\\S(?:\\<[^>]+\\>)?){1,10})+$";Di2015NewLine//Regex rx = new Regex(pattern);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// regex comments spanning multiple lines requires use of RegexOptions.IgnorePatternWhitespaceDi2015NewLinestring pattern = @"^(               # match line/string start, begin groupDi2015NewLine                    (?:\\S           # match (but don't capture) non-whitespace charsDi2015NewLine                    (?:\\<[^>]+\\>)?  # optionally match (doesn't capture) an html <...> tagDi2015NewLine                                    # to match img tags only change to (?:\\<img[^>]+\\>)?Di2015NewLine                    ){1,10}         # match upto 10 chars (tags don't count per your example)Di2015NewLine                    )+$             # match at least once, and match end of line/stringDi2015NewLine                    ";Di2015NewLineRegex rx = new Regex(pattern, RegexOptions.IgnorePatternWhitespace);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineforeach (string sample in samples)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    if (rx.IsMatch(sample))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        foreach (Match m in rx.Matches(sample))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // using group index 1, group 0 is the entire match which I'm not interested inDi2015NewLine            foreach (Capture c in m.Groups[1].Captures)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Capture: {0} -- ({1})", c.Value, c.Value.Length);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Not a match: {0}", sample);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

846165Di2015UniqueSeparator    public static int NonQuery(string sql)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Dictionary<string, object> parameters = null;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (parameters == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            parameters = new Dictionary<string, object>();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (DbConnection connection = factory.CreateConnection())Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            connection.ConnectionString = connectionString;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            using (DbCommand command = factory.CreateCommand())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                command.Connection = connection;Di2015NewLine                command.CommandText = sql;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                foreach (KeyValuePair<string, object> p in parameters)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    var parameter = command.CreateParameter();Di2015NewLine                    parameter.ParameterName = p.Key;Di2015NewLine                    parameter.Value = p.Value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    command.Parameters.Add(parameter);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                connection.Open();Di2015NewLine                return command.ExecuteNonQuery();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

847495Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic sealed class DataCounterDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    private class CounterBoxDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        public int Count { get; set; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    public event EventHandler NewKeyEvent;Di2015NewLine    public event EventHandler ZeroCountEvent;Di2015NewLine    private readonly Dictionary<string, CounterBox> _dataDi2015NewLine        = new Dictionary<string, CounterBox>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Register(string dataKey)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (_data)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            CounterBox box;Di2015NewLine            if (_data.TryGetValue(dataKey, out box))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                box.Count++;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                _data.Add(dataKey, new CounterBox { Count = 1 });Di2015NewLine                EventHandler handler = NewKeyEvent;Di2015NewLine                if (handler != null) handler(this, EventArgs.Empty);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void Deregister(string dataKey)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        lock (_data)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            CounterBox box;Di2015NewLine            if (_data.TryGetValue(dataKey, out box))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (box.Count > 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    box.Count--;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (box.Count == 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    EventHandler handler = ZeroCountEvent;Di2015NewLine                    if (handler != null) handler(this, EventArgs.Empty);Di2015NewLine                    _data.Remove(dataKey);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

847975Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class GroupGeneratorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static T Create<T>(IEnumerable<T> items) where T : classDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (T)Activator.CreateInstance(Cache<T>.Type, items);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    private static class Cache<T> where T : classDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        internal static readonly Type Type;Di2015NewLine        static Cache()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!typeof(T).IsInterface)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                throw new InvalidOperationException(typeof(T).NameDi2015NewLine                    + " is not an interface");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            AssemblyName an = new AssemblyName("tmp_" + typeof(T).Name);Di2015NewLine            var asm = AppDomain.CurrentDomain.DefineDynamicAssembly(Di2015NewLine                an, AssemblyBuilderAccess.RunAndSave);Di2015NewLine            string moduleName = Path.ChangeExtension(an.Name,"dll");Di2015NewLine            var module = asm.DefineDynamicModule(moduleName, false);Di2015NewLine            string ns = typeof(T).Namespace;Di2015NewLine            if (!string.IsNullOrEmpty(ns)) ns += ".";Di2015NewLine            var type = module.DefineType(ns + "grp_" + typeof(T).Name,Di2015NewLine                TypeAttributes.Class | TypeAttributes.AnsiClass |Di2015NewLine                TypeAttributes.Sealed | TypeAttributes.NotPublic);Di2015NewLine            type.AddInterfaceImplementation(typeof(T));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            var fld = type.DefineField("items", typeof(IEnumerable<T>),Di2015NewLine                FieldAttributes.Private);Di2015NewLine            var ctor = type.DefineConstructor(MethodAttributes.Public,Di2015NewLine                CallingConventions.HasThis, new Type[] { fld.FieldType });Di2015NewLine            var il = ctor.GetILGenerator();Di2015NewLine            // store the itemsDi2015NewLine            il.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_0);Di2015NewLine            il.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_1);Di2015NewLine            il.Emit(OpCodes.Stfld, fld);Di2015NewLine            il.Emit(OpCodes.Ret);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            foreach (var method in typeof(T).GetMethods())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                var args = method.GetParameters();Di2015NewLine                var methodImpl = type.DefineMethod(method.Name,Di2015NewLine                    MethodAttributes.Private | MethodAttributes.Virtual,Di2015NewLine                    method.ReturnType,Di2015NewLine                    Array.ConvertAll(args, arg => arg.ParameterType));Di2015NewLine                type.DefineMethodOverride(methodImpl, method);Di2015NewLine                il = methodImpl.GetILGenerator();Di2015NewLine                if (method.ReturnType != typeof(void))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    il.Emit(OpCodes.Ldstr,Di2015NewLine                        "Methods with return values are not supported");Di2015NewLine                    il.Emit(OpCodes.Newobj, typeof(NotSupportedException)Di2015NewLine                        .GetConstructor(new Type[] {typeof(string)}));Di2015NewLine                    il.Emit(OpCodes.Throw);Di2015NewLine                    continue;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // get the iteratorDi2015NewLine                var iter = il.DeclareLocal(typeof(IEnumerator<T>));Di2015NewLine                il.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_0);Di2015NewLine                il.Emit(OpCodes.Ldfld, fld);Di2015NewLine                il.EmitCall(OpCodes.Callvirt, typeof(IEnumerable<T>)Di2015NewLine                    .GetMethod("GetEnumerator"), null);Di2015NewLine                il.Emit(OpCodes.Stloc, iter);Di2015NewLine                Label tryFinally = il.BeginExceptionBlock();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // jump to "progress the iterator"Di2015NewLine                Label loop = il.DefineLabel();Di2015NewLine                il.Emit(OpCodes.Br_S, loop);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // process each item (invoke the paired method)Di2015NewLine                Label doItem = il.DefineLabel();Di2015NewLine                il.MarkLabel(doItem);Di2015NewLine                il.Emit(OpCodes.Ldloc, iter);Di2015NewLine                il.EmitCall(OpCodes.Callvirt, typeof(IEnumerator<T>)Di2015NewLine                    .GetProperty("Current").GetGetMethod(), null);Di2015NewLine                for (int i = 0; i < args.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine                { // load the argumentsDi2015NewLine                    switch (i)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        case 0: il.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_1); break;Di2015NewLine                        case 1: il.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_2); break;Di2015NewLine                        case 2: il.Emit(OpCodes.Ldarg_3); break;Di2015NewLine                        default:Di2015NewLine                            il.Emit(i < 255 ? OpCodes.Ldarg_SDi2015NewLine                                : OpCodes.Ldarg, i + 1);Di2015NewLine                            break;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                il.EmitCall(OpCodes.Callvirt, method, null);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // progress the iteratorDi2015NewLine                il.MarkLabel(loop);Di2015NewLine                il.Emit(OpCodes.Ldloc, iter);Di2015NewLine                il.EmitCall(OpCodes.Callvirt, typeof(IEnumerator)Di2015NewLine                    .GetMethod("MoveNext"), null);Di2015NewLine                il.Emit(OpCodes.Brtrue_S, doItem);Di2015NewLine                il.Emit(OpCodes.Leave_S, tryFinally);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // dispose iteratorDi2015NewLine                il.BeginFinallyBlock();Di2015NewLine                Label endFinally = il.DefineLabel();Di2015NewLine                il.Emit(OpCodes.Ldloc, iter);Di2015NewLine                il.Emit(OpCodes.Brfalse_S, endFinally);Di2015NewLine                il.Emit(OpCodes.Ldloc, iter);Di2015NewLine                il.EmitCall(OpCodes.Callvirt, typeof(IDisposable)Di2015NewLine                    .GetMethod("Dispose"), null);Di2015NewLine                il.MarkLabel(endFinally);Di2015NewLine                il.EndExceptionBlock();Di2015NewLine                il.Emit(OpCodes.Ret);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            Cache<T>.Type = type.CreateType();Di2015NewLine#if DEBUG       // for inspection purposes...Di2015NewLine            asm.Save(moduleName);Di2015NewLine#endifDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

848184Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static int GetColumnNumber(string name)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int number = 0;Di2015NewLine    int pow = 1;Di2015NewLine    for (int i = name.Length - 1; i >= 0; i--)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        number += (name[i] - 'A' + 1) * pow;Di2015NewLine        pow *= 26;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return number;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

Make sure you escape the \\ character.Di2015NewLine                WqlEventQuery query = new WqlEventQuery(Di2015NewLine                     "SELECT * FROM RegistryValueChangeEvent WHERE " +Di2015NewLine                     "Hive = 'HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE'" +Di2015NewLine                     @"AND KeyPath = 'SOFTWARE\\\\Microsoft\\\\.NETFramework' AND ValueName='InstallRoot'");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                ManagementEventWatcher watcher = new ManagementEventWatcher(query);Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Waiting for an event...");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Set up the delegate that will handle the change event.Di2015NewLine                watcher.EventArrived += new EventArrivedEventHandler(HandleEvent);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Start listening for events.Di2015NewLine                watcher.Start();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Do something while waiting for events. In your application,Di2015NewLine                // this would just be continuing business as usual.Di2015NewLine                System.Threading.Thread.Sleep(100000000);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Stop listening for events.Di2015NewLine                watcher.Stop();Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            catch (ManagementException managementException)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("An error occurred: " + managementException.Message);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="sender">Di2015NewLine        /// The sender.Di2015NewLine        /// </param>Di2015NewLine        /// <param name="e">Di2015NewLine        /// The e.Di2015NewLine        /// </param>Di2015NewLine        private void HandleEvent(object sender, EventArrivedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Received an event.");Di2015NewLine            // RegistryKeyChangeEvent occurs here; do something.Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        /// <summary>Di2015NewLine        /// </summary>Di2015NewLine        public static void Main()Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Just calls the class above to check for events...Di2015NewLine            WmiChangeEventTester receiveEvent = new WmiChangeEventTester();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
849541Di2015UniqueSeparator    private void DoThePrint(System.Windows.Documents.FlowDocument document)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Clone the source document's content into a new FlowDocument.Di2015NewLine        // This is because the pagination for the printer needs to be Di2015NewLine        // done differently than the pagination for the displayed page. Di2015NewLine        // We print the copy, rather that the original FlowDocument. Di2015NewLine        System.IO.MemoryStream s = new System.IO.MemoryStream();Di2015NewLine        TextRange source = new TextRange(document.ContentStart, document.ContentEnd);Di2015NewLine        source.Save(s, DataFormats.Xaml);Di2015NewLine        FlowDocument copy = new FlowDocument();Di2015NewLine        TextRange dest = new TextRange(copy.ContentStart, copy.ContentEnd);Di2015NewLine        dest.Load(s, DataFormats.Xaml);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Create a XpsDocumentWriter object, implicitly opening a Windows common print dialog, Di2015NewLine        // and allowing the user to select a printer.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // get information about the dimensions of the seleted printer+media. Di2015NewLine        System.Printing.PrintDocumentImageableArea ia = null;Di2015NewLine        System.Windows.Xps.XpsDocumentWriter docWriter = System.Printing.PrintQueue.CreateXpsDocumentWriter(ref ia);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (docWriter != null && ia != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            DocumentPaginator paginator = ((IDocumentPaginatorSource)copy).DocumentPaginator;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Change the PageSize and PagePadding for the document to match the CanvasSize for the printer device.Di2015NewLine            paginator.PageSize = new Size(ia.MediaSizeWidth, ia.MediaSizeHeight);Di2015NewLine            Thickness t = new Thickness(72);  // copy.PagePadding;Di2015NewLine            copy.PagePadding = new Thickness(Di2015NewLine                             Math.Max(ia.OriginWidth, t.Left),Di2015NewLine                               Math.Max(ia.OriginHeight, t.Top),Di2015NewLine                               Math.Max(ia.MediaSizeWidth - (ia.OriginWidth + ia.ExtentWidth), t.Right),Di2015NewLine                               Math.Max(ia.MediaSizeHeight - (ia.OriginHeight + ia.ExtentHeight), t.Bottom));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            copy.ColumnWidth = double.PositiveInfinity;Di2015NewLine            //copy.PageWidth = 528; // allow the page to be the natural with of the output deviceDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Send content to the printer.Di2015NewLine            docWriter.Write(paginator);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

850587Di2015UniqueSeparator  static int outCol, outRow, outHeight = 10;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  static void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine     bool quit = false;Di2015NewLine     System.DateTime dt = DateTime.Now;Di2015NewLine     doDi2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine        if (Console.KeyAvailable)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine           if (Console.ReadKey(false).Key == ConsoleKey.Escape)Di2015NewLine              quit = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        System.Threading.Thread.Sleep(0);Di2015NewLine        if (DateTime.Now.Subtract(dt).TotalSeconds > .1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine           dt = DateTime.Now;Di2015NewLine           WriteOut(dt.ToString(" ss.ff"), false);Di2015NewLine        }            Di2015NewLine     } while (!quit);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  static void WriteOut(string msg, bool appendNewLine)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine     int inCol, inRow;Di2015NewLine     inCol = Console.CursorLeft;Di2015NewLine     inRow = Console.CursorTop;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine     int outLines = getMsgRowCount(outCol, msg) + (appendNewLine?1:0);Di2015NewLine     int outBottom = outRow + outLines;Di2015NewLine     if (outBottom > outHeight)Di2015NewLine        outBottom = outHeight;Di2015NewLine     if (inRow <= outBottom)Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine        int scrollCount = outBottom - inRow + 1;Di2015NewLine        Console.MoveBufferArea(0, inRow, Console.BufferWidth, 1, 0, inRow + scrollCount);Di2015NewLine        inRow += scrollCount;Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine     if (outRow + outLines > outHeight)Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine        int scrollCount = outRow + outLines - outHeight;Di2015NewLine        Console.MoveBufferArea(0, scrollCount, Console.BufferWidth, outHeight - scrollCount, 0, 0);Di2015NewLine        outRow -= scrollCount;Di2015NewLine        Console.SetCursorPosition(outCol, outRow);Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine     Console.SetCursorPosition(outCol, outRow);Di2015NewLine     if (appendNewLine)Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(msg);Di2015NewLine     elseDi2015NewLine        Console.Write(msg);Di2015NewLine     outCol = Console.CursorLeft;Di2015NewLine     outRow = Console.CursorTop;Di2015NewLine     Console.SetCursorPosition(inCol, inRow);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  static int getMsgRowCount(int startCol, string msg)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine     string[] lines = msg.Split('\\n');Di2015NewLine     int result = 0;Di2015NewLine     foreach (string line in lines)Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine        result += (startCol + line.Length) / Console.BufferWidth;Di2015NewLine        startCol = 0;Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine     return result + lines.Length - 1;Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine

true;Di2015NewLine    psi.WindowStyle = ProcessWindowStyle.Hidden;Di2015NewLine    psi.UseShellExecute = false;Di2015NewLine    psi.CreateNoWindow = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Process.Start( psi );Di2015NewLine        psi.Arguments = arguments;Di2015NewLine        svnCommand = Process.Start( psi );Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var file = new {Di2015NewLine        if (svnCommand != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            svnCommand.Close();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    result = output;Di2015NewLine    errors = errorLines;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return retval;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

853004Di2015UniqueSeparatorstruct INDIDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            public string ID;Di2015NewLine            public string Name;Di2015NewLine            public string Sex;Di2015NewLine            public string BirthDay;Di2015NewLine            public bool Dead;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        struct FAMDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            public string FamID;Di2015NewLine            public string type;Di2015NewLine            public string IndiID;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        List<INDI> Individuals = new List<INDI>();Di2015NewLine        List<FAM> Family = new List<FAM>();Di2015NewLine        private void button1_Click(object sender, EventArgs e)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string path = @"C:\\mostrecent.ged";Di2015NewLine            ParseGedcom(path);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private void ParseGedcom(string path)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            //Open path to GED fileDi2015NewLine            StreamReader SR = new StreamReader(path);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //Read entire block and then plit on 0 @ for individuals and familys (no other info is needed for this instance)Di2015NewLine            string[] Holder = SR.ReadToEnd().Replace("0 @", "\\u0646").Split('\\u0646');Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //For each new cell in the holder array look for Individuals and familysDi2015NewLine            foreach (string Node in Holder)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //Sub Split the string on the returns to get a true block of infoDi2015NewLine                string[] SubNode = Node.Replace("\\r\\n", "\\r").Split('\\r');Di2015NewLine                //If a individual is foundDi2015NewLine                if (SubNode[0].Contains("INDI"))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    //Create new StructureDi2015NewLine                    INDI I = new INDI();Di2015NewLine                    //Add the ID number and remove extra formatingDi2015NewLine                    I.ID = SubNode[0].Replace("@", "").Replace(" INDI", "").Trim();Di2015NewLine                    //Find the name remove extra formating for last nameDi2015NewLine                    I.Name = SubNode[FindIndexinArray(SubNode, "NAME")].Replace("1 NAME", "").Replace("/", "").Trim(); Di2015NewLine                    //Find Sex and remove extra formatingDi2015NewLine                    I.Sex = SubNode[FindIndexinArray(SubNode, "SEX")].Replace("1 SEX ", "").Trim();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    //Deterine if there is a brithday -1 means noDi2015NewLine                    if (FindIndexinArray(SubNode, "1 BIRT ") != -1)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        // add birthday to Struct Di2015NewLine                        I.BirthDay = SubNode[FindIndexinArray(SubNode, "1 BIRT ") + 1].Replace("2 DATE ", "").Trim();Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // deterimin if there is a death tag will return -1 if not foundDi2015NewLine                    if (FindIndexinArray(SubNode, "1 DEAT ") != -1)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        //convert Y or N to true or false ( defaults to False so no need to change unless Y is found.Di2015NewLine                        if (SubNode[FindIndexinArray(SubNode, "1 DEAT ")].Replace("1 DEAT ", "").Trim() == "Y")Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            //set deathDi2015NewLine                            I.Dead = true;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    //add the Struct to the list for later useDi2015NewLine                    Individuals.Add(I);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                // Start Family sectionDi2015NewLine                else if (SubNode[0].Contains("FAM"))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    //grab Fam id from node early on to keep from doing it over and overDi2015NewLine                    string FamID = SubNode[0].Replace("@ FAM", "");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Multiple children can exist for each family so this section had to be a bit more dynaimicDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    // Look at each line of nodeDi2015NewLine                    foreach (string Line in SubNode)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        // If node is HUSBDi2015NewLine                        if (Line.Contains("1 HUSB "))Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            FAM F = new FAM();Di2015NewLine                            F.FamID = FamID;Di2015NewLine                            F.type = "PAR";Di2015NewLine                            F.IndiID = Line.Replace("1 HUSB ", "").Replace("@","").Trim();Di2015NewLine                            Family.Add(F);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                            //If node for WifeDi2015NewLine                        else if (Line.Contains("1 WIFE "))Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            FAM F = new FAM();Di2015NewLine                            F.FamID = FamID;Di2015NewLine                            F.type = "PAR";Di2015NewLine                            F.IndiID = Line.Replace("1 WIFE ", "").Replace("@", "").Trim();Di2015NewLine                            Family.Add(F);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                            //if node for multi childrenDi2015NewLine                        else if (Line.Contains("1 CHIL "))Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            FAM F = new FAM();Di2015NewLine                             F.FamID = FamID;Di2015NewLine                            F.type = "CHIL";Di2015NewLine                            F.IndiID = Line.Replace("1 CHIL ", "").Replace("@", "");Di2015NewLine                            Family.Add(F);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        private int FindIndexinArray(string[] Arr, string search)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int Val = -1;Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < Arr.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                if (Arr[i].Contains(search))Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    Val = i;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            return Val;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine

853599Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static string CreateDelimitedString(IEnumerable<string> items)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (string item in items)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        sb.Append(item.Replace("\\\\", "\\\\\\\\").Replace(",", "\\\\,"));Di2015NewLine        sb.Append(",");Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    return (sb.Length > 0) ? sb.ToString(0, sb.Length - 1) : string.Empty;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

853599Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static IEnumerable<string> GetItemsFromDelimitedString(string s)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    bool escaped = false;Di2015NewLine    StringBuilder sb = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (char c in s)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if ((c == '\\\\') && !escaped)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            escaped = true;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        else if ((c == ',') && !escaped)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            yield return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine            sb.Length = 0;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            sb.Append(c);Di2015NewLine            escaped = false;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    yield return sb.ToString();Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

854026Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static class ParserDi2015NewLine{    Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string hex = "0xBAC893CAB8B7FE03C927417A2A3F6A6"Di2015NewLine                     + "0BD30FF35E250011CB25507EBFCD5223B";Di2015NewLine        byte[] parsed = ParseHex(hex);Di2015NewLine        // Just for confirmation...Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine(BitConverter.ToString(parsed));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static byte[] ParseHex(string hex)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int offset = hex.StartsWith("0x") ? 2 : 0;Di2015NewLine        if ((hex.Length % 2) != 0)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("Invalid length: " + hex.Length);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        byte[] ret = new byte[(hex.Length-offset)/2];Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for (int i=0; i < ret.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ret[i] = (byte) ((ParseNybble(hex[offset]) << 4) Di2015NewLine                             | ParseNybble(hex[offset+1]));Di2015NewLine            offset += 2;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return ret;Di2015NewLine    }        Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static int ParseNybble(char c)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (c >= '0' && c <= '9')Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return c-'0';Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (c >= 'A' && c <= 'F')Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return c-'A'+10;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (c >= 'a' && c <= 'f')Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return c-'a'+10;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("Invalid hex digit: " + c);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
854026Di2015UniqueSeparatorParseNybble
854026Di2015UniqueSeparator    static int ParseNybble(char c)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        switch (c)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            case '0': case '1': case '2': case '3': case '4':Di2015NewLine            case '5': case '6': case '7': case '8': case '9':Di2015NewLine                return c-'0';Di2015NewLine            case 'A': case 'B': case 'C': case 'D': case 'E': case 'F':Di2015NewLine                return c-'A'+10;Di2015NewLine            case 'a': case 'b': case 'c': case 'd': case 'e': case 'f':Di2015NewLine                return c-'a'+10;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        throw new ArgumentException("Invalid hex digit: " + c);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

854773Di2015UniqueSeparator    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Sets the font size so the text is as large as possible while still fitting in the textDi2015NewLine    /// area with out any scrollbars.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    public void ScaleFontToFit()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        int fontSize = 10;Di2015NewLine        const int incrementDelta = 5; // amount to increase font by each loop iter.Di2015NewLine        const int decrementDelta = 1; // amount to decrease to fine tune.Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        this.SuspendLayout();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // First we set the font size to the minimum.  We assume at the minimum size no scrollbars will be visible.Di2015NewLine        SetFontSize(MinimumFontSize);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Next, we increment font size until it doesn't fit (or max font size is reached).Di2015NewLine        for (fontSize = MinFontSize; fontSize < MaxFontSize; fontSize += incrementDelta)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            SetFontSize(fontSize);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (!DoesTextFit())Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //Console.WriteLine("Text Doesn't fit at fontsize = " + fontSize);Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Finally, we keep decreasing the font size until it fits again.Di2015NewLine        for (; fontSize > MinFontSize && !DoesTextFit(); fontSize -= decrementDelta)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            SetFontSize(fontSize);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        this.ResumeLayout();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    #region Private MethodsDi2015NewLine    private bool VScrollVisibleDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        getDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Rectangle clientRectangle = this.ClientRectangle;Di2015NewLine            Size size = this.Size;Di2015NewLine            return (size.Width - clientRectangle.Width) >= SystemInformation.VerticalScrollBarWidth;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /**Di2015NewLine     * returns true when the Text no longer fits in the bounds of this control without scrollbars.Di2015NewLine    */Di2015NewLine    private bool DoesTextFit()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine            if (VScrollVisible)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                //Console.WriteLine("#1 Vscroll is visible");Di2015NewLine                return false;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Special logic to handle the single line case... When multiline is false, we cannot rely on scrollbars so alternate methods.Di2015NewLine            if (this.Multiline == false)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Graphics graphics = this.CreateGraphics();Di2015NewLine                Size stringSize = graphics.MeasureString(this.Text, this.SelectionFont).ToSize();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //Console.WriteLine("String Width/Height: " + stringSize.Width + " " + stringSize.Height + "form... " + this.Width + " " + this.Height);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (stringSize.Width > this.Width)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    //Console.WriteLine("#2 Text Width is too big");Di2015NewLine                    return false;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (stringSize.Height > this.Height)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    //Console.WriteLine("#3 Text Height is too big");Di2015NewLine                    return false;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (this.Lines.Length > 1)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    //Console.WriteLine("#4 " + this.Lines[0] + " (2): " + this.Lines[1]); // I believe this condition could be removed.Di2015NewLine                    return false;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            return true;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void SetFontSize(int pFontSize)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        SetFontSize((float)pFontSize);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void SetFontSize(float pFontSize)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.SelectAll();Di2015NewLine        this.SelectionFont = new Font(this.SelectionFont.FontFamily, pFontSize, this.SelectionFont.Style);Di2015NewLine        this.SelectionAlignment = HorizontalAlignment;Di2015NewLine        this.Select(0, 0);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    #endregionDi2015NewLine

855704Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static String ChrTran(String ToBeCleaned, Di2015NewLine                             String ChangeThese, Di2015NewLine                             String IntoThese)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine   String CurRepl = String.Empty;Di2015NewLine   for (int lnI = 0; lnI < ChangeThese.Length; lnI++)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      if (lnI < IntoThese.Length)Di2015NewLine         CurRepl = IntoThese.Substring(lnI, 1);Di2015NewLine      elseDi2015NewLine         CurRepl = String.Empty;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      ToBeCleaned = ToBeCleaned.Replace(ChangeThese.Substring(lnI, 1), CurRepl);Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine   return ToBeCleaned;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

855925Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic abstract class MultipartRangeHandler : IHttpHandlerDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    protected const String HEADER_RANGE = "range";Di2015NewLine    protected const String HEADER_CONTENT_TYPE = "Content-Type";Di2015NewLine    protected const String HEADER_CONTENT_LENGTH = "Content-Length: ";Di2015NewLine    protected const String HEADER_CONTENT_DISPOSITION = "Content-Disposition";Di2015NewLine    protected const String HEADER_CONTENT_RANGE = "Content-Range";Di2015NewLine    protected const String HEADER_BOUNDARY_DELIMETER = "--";Di2015NewLine    protected const String HEADER_STATUS_PARTIAL_CONTENT = "Partial Content";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private const char COMMA = ',';Di2015NewLine    private const char EQUALS = '=';Di2015NewLine    private const char NEW_LINE = '\\n';Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected const String QS_OBJECT_ID = "cid";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public void ProcessRequest(HttpContext context)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (StringUtils.isNullOrEmpty(context.Request.QueryString[QS_OBJECT_ID]))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            sendResponse(400, "400 Bad Request", "No resource was specified in the query string to retrieve.", context);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            ContentItem contentItem = getContentItem(context.Request.QueryString[QS_OBJECT_ID]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            if (contentItem != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                context.Response.Clear();Di2015NewLine                context.Response.ClearHeaders();Di2015NewLine                context.Response.ClearContent();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (context.Request.Headers[HEADER_RANGE] != null)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    string range = context.Request.Headers[HEADER_RANGE];Di2015NewLine                    range = range.Substring(range.LastIndexOf(EQUALS) + 1);Di2015NewLine                    bool isMultipartRange = range.Contains(COMMA.ToString());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    if (!isMultipartRange)Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        addHeader(context.Response, HEADER_CONTENT_TYPE, contentItem.MimeType);Di2015NewLine                        addHeader(context.Response, HEADER_CONTENT_DISPOSITION, "inline; filename=\\"" + contentItem.Filename + "\\"");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        string[] startEnd = range.Split('-');Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        long startPos;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        long.TryParse(startEnd[0], out startPos);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        long endPos;Di2015NewLine                        int fileSize = contentItem.FileBytes.Length;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        if (startEnd.GetUpperBound(0) >= 1 && startEnd[1] != String.Empty)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            long.TryParse(startEnd[1], out endPos);Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLine                        elseDi2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            endPos = fileSize - startPos;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        if (endPos > fileSize)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            endPos = fileSize - startPos;Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        context.Response.StatusCode = 206;Di2015NewLine                        context.Response.StatusDescription = HEADER_STATUS_PARTIAL_CONTENT;Di2015NewLine                        addHeader(context.Response, HEADER_CONTENT_RANGE, "bytes " + startPos + "-" + endPos + "/" + fileSize);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        context.Response.BinaryWrite(ByteUtils.subByte(contentItem.FileBytes, (int)startPos, (int)(endPos - startPos) + 1));Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        string boundary = "waynehartmanansmach";Di2015NewLine                        addHeader(context.Response, HEADER_CONTENT_TYPE, "multipart/byteranges; boundary=" + boundary);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        List<string[]> ranges = new List<string[]>();Di2015NewLine                        string[] multiRange = range.Split(new string[] { "," }, StringSplitOptions.RemoveEmptyEntries);Di2015NewLine                        foreach (string mr in multiRange)Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            ranges.Add(mr.Split(new string[] { "-" }, StringSplitOptions.RemoveEmptyEntries));Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        //  process the list of rangesDi2015NewLine                        foreach (string[] rangeArray in ranges.ToArray())Di2015NewLine                        {Di2015NewLine                            context.Response.Write(HEADER_BOUNDARY_DELIMETER + boundary + NEW_LINE);Di2015NewLine                            context.Response.Write(HEADER_CONTENT_TYPE + ": " + contentItem.MimeType + NEW_LINE);Di2015NewLine                            context.Response.Write(HEADER_CONTENT_RANGE + ": bytes " + rangeArray[0] + "-" + rangeArray[1] + "/" + contentItem.FileBytes + NEW_LINE + NEW_LINE);Di2015NewLine                            long startPos = long.Parse(rangeArray[0]);Di2015NewLine                            long endPos = long.Parse(rangeArray[1]);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            context.Response.BinaryWrite(ByteUtils.subByte(contentItem.FileBytes, (int)startPos, (int)(endPos - startPos) + 1));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                            context.Response.Write(NEW_LINE);Di2015NewLine                            context.Response.Flush();Di2015NewLine                        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                        context.Response.Write(HEADER_BOUNDARY_DELIMETER + boundary + HEADER_BOUNDARY_DELIMETER + NEW_LINE + NEW_LINE);Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    context.Response.ContentType = contentItem.MimeType;Di2015NewLine                    addHeader(context.Response, HEADER_CONTENT_DISPOSITION, "attachment; filename=\\"" + contentItem.Filename + "\\"");Di2015NewLine                    addHeader(context.Response, HEADER_CONTENT_LENGTH, contentItem.FileBytes.Length.ToString());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    context.Response.OutputStream.Write(contentItem.FileBytes, 0, contentItem.FileBytes.Length);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            elseDi2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                sendResponse(404, "404 Not Found", "The resource requested does not exist.", context);                    Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private void sendResponse(int statusCode, String status, String statusMessage, HttpContext context)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        System.Text.StringBuilder data = new System.Text.StringBuilder();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        data.AppendLine("<html><body>");Di2015NewLine        data.AppendLine("<h1>"+status+"</h1>");Di2015NewLine        data.AppendLine("<p>"+statusMessage+"</p>");Di2015NewLine        data.AppendLine("</body></html>");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        byte[] headerData = System.Text.Encoding.ASCII.GetBytes(data.ToString());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        context.Response.ContentType = "text/html";Di2015NewLine        context.Response.StatusCode = statusCode;Di2015NewLine        context.Response.Status = status;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        addHeader(context.Response, HEADER_CONTENT_LENGTH, headerData.Length.ToString());Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //context.Response.AddHeader("Content-Length: ", headerData.Length.ToString());Di2015NewLine        context.Response.OutputStream.Write(headerData, 0, headerData.Length);Di2015NewLine        context.Response.End();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected void addHeader(HttpResponse response, String key, String value)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        response.AddHeader(key, value);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    protected abstract com.waynehartman.util.web.handlers.multipartrange.ContentItem getContentItem(String objectID);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public bool IsReusableDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        get { return true; }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

857547Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static void Queue(Action action, Action done) {Di2015NewLine    ThreadPool.QueueUserWorkItem(_ =>Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        try {Di2015NewLine            action();Di2015NewLine        } Di2015NewLine        catch (ThreadAbortException) { /* dont report on this */ } Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception ex) {Di2015NewLine            Debug.Assert(false, "Async thread crashed! This must be fixed. " + ex.ToString());Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // note: this will not be called if the thread is abortedDi2015NewLine        if (done != null) done();Di2015NewLine    });Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

857583Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static double Average(this IEnumerable<int> source)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    return source.AsParallel().Aggregate(Di2015NewLine        () => new double[2],Di2015NewLine        (acc, elem) => { acc[0] += elem; acc[1]++; return acc; },Di2015NewLine        (acc1, acc2) => { acc1[0] += acc2[0]; acc1[1] += acc2[1]; return acc1; },Di2015NewLine        acc => acc[0] / acc[1]);Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

857946Di2015UniqueSeparator    private ManagementEventWatcher WatchForProcessStart(string processName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string queryString =Di2015NewLine            "SELECT TargetInstance" +Di2015NewLine            "  FROM __InstanceCreationEvent " +Di2015NewLine            "WITHIN  10 " +Di2015NewLine            " WHERE TargetInstance ISA 'Win32_Process' " +Di2015NewLine            "   AND TargetInstance.Name = '" + processName + "'";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // The dot in the scope means use the current machineDi2015NewLine        string scope = @"\\\\.\\root\\CIMV2";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Create a watcher and listen for eventsDi2015NewLine        ManagementEventWatcher watcher = new ManagementEventWatcher(scope, queryString);Di2015NewLine        watcher.EventArrived += ProcessStarted;Di2015NewLine        watcher.Start();Di2015NewLine        return watcher;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private ManagementEventWatcher WatchForProcessEnd(string processName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string queryString =Di2015NewLine            "SELECT TargetInstance" +Di2015NewLine            "  FROM __InstanceDeletionEvent " +Di2015NewLine            "WITHIN  10 " +Di2015NewLine            " WHERE TargetInstance ISA 'Win32_Process' " +Di2015NewLine            "   AND TargetInstance.Name 858736Di2015UniqueSeparator// copied from Mono, because CF lacks this enumDi2015NewLineenum SocketErrorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    IOPending = 997,Di2015NewLine    NoBufferSpaceAvailable = 10055,Di2015NewLine    TimedOut = 10060,Di2015NewLine    WouldBlock = 10035Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// millisecondsDi2015NewLineint receiveTimeout = 20000;Di2015NewLineint sendTimeout = 20000;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic override int Read(byte[] buffer, int offset, int size)Di2015NewLine{    Di2015NewLine    int startTickCount = Environment.TickCount;Di2015NewLine    int received = 0;Di2015NewLine    doDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    \List<Socket> sock = new List<Socket>(new Socket[] {socket});Di2015NewLine    \Socket.Select(sock, null, null, receiveTimeout*1000 + 1);Di2015NewLine    \if (Environment.TickCount > startTickCount + receiveTimeout)Di2015NewLine    \\throw new SocketException((int) SocketError.TimedOut);Di2015NewLine    \tryDi2015NewLine    \{Di2015NewLine    \\received += socket.Receive(buffer, offset + received,Di2015NewLine    \\\size - received, SocketFlags.None);Di2015NewLine    \}Di2015NewLine    \catch (SocketException ex)Di2015NewLine    \{Di2015NewLine    \\if (ex.ErrorCode == (int) SocketError.WouldBlock ||Di2015NewLine    \\    ex.ErrorCode == (int) SocketError.IOPending ||Di2015NewLine    \\    ex.ErrorCode == (int) SocketError.NoBufferSpaceAvailable)Di2015NewLine    \\{Di2015NewLine    \\\// socket buffer is probably empty, wait and try againDi2015NewLine    \\\Thread.Sleep(30);Di2015NewLine    \\}Di2015NewLine    \\elseDi2015NewLine    \\\throw; // any serious error occurrDi2015NewLine    \}Di2015NewLine    } while (received < size);Di2015NewLine    return received;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic override void Write(byte[] buffer, int offset, int size)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    int startTickCount = Environment.TickCount;Di2015NewLine    int sent = 0;Di2015NewLine    doDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    \List<Socket> sock = new List<Socket>(new Socket[] {socket});Di2015NewLine    \Socket.Select(null, sock, null, sendTimeout*1000 + 1);Di2015NewLine    \if (Environment.TickCount > startTickCount + sendTimeout)Di2015NewLine    \\throw new SocketException((int) SocketError.TimedOut);Di2015NewLine    \tryDi2015NewLine    \{Di2015NewLine    \\sent += socket.Send(buffer, offset + sent,Di2015NewLine    \\\size - sent, SocketFlags.None);Di2015NewLine    \}Di2015NewLine    \catch (SocketException ex)Di2015NewLine    \{Di2015NewLine    \\if (ex.ErrorCode == (int) SocketError.WouldBlock ||Di2015NewLine    \\    ex.ErrorCode == (int) SocketError.IOPending ||Di2015NewLine    \\    ex.ErrorCode == (int) SocketError.NoBufferSpaceAvailable)Di2015NewLine    \\{Di2015NewLine    \\\// socket buffer is probably full, wait and try againDi2015NewLine    \\\Thread.Sleep(30);Di2015NewLine    \\}Di2015NewLine    \\elseDi2015NewLine    \\\throw; 858751Di2015UniqueSeparator        private static unsafe void CopyBitmapToDestSuperFast(BitmapData sourcebtmpdata, BitmapData destbtmpdata, Point point)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //calculate total number of rows to copy.Di2015NewLine        //using ternary operator instead of Math.Min, few ms fasterDi2015NewLine        int totalRows = (destbtmpdata.Height - point.Y < sourcebtmpdata.Height) ? destbtmpdata.Height - point.Y : sourcebtmpdata.Height;Di2015NewLine        //calculate the width of the image to draw, this cuts off the imageDi2015NewLine        //if it goes past the width of the destination imageDi2015NewLine        int rowWidth = (destbtmpdata.Width - point.X < sourcebtmpdata.Width) ? destbtmpdata.Width - point.X : sourcebtmpdata.Width;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //loop through each row on the source bitmap and get mem pointersDi2015NewLine        //to the source bitmap and dest bitmapDi2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < totalRows; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            int destRow = point.Y + i;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //get the pointer to the start of the current pixel "row" and column on the output imageDi2015NewLine            byte* destRowPtr = (byte*)destbtmpdata.Scan0 + (destRow * destbtmpdata.Stride) + point.X * 3;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //get the pointer to the start of the FIRST pixel row on the source imageDi2015NewLine            byte* srcRowPtr = (byte*)sourcebtmpdata.Scan0 + (i * sourcebtmpdata.Stride);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            //RtlMoveMemory functionDi2015NewLine            CopyMemory(new IntPtr(destRowPtr), new IntPtr(srcRowPtr), (uint)rowWidth * 3);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

859995Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System.Text.RegularExpressions;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic void Main(string[] args)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string[] formulas = { "Z1", "ZZ1", "AZ1", "AZB1", "BZZ2",Di2015NewLine                        "=SUM($B$99:B99)","=SUM($F99:F99)", "=(SUM($B$0:B0)/SUM(1!$B$11:22!B33) -1)",Di2015NewLine                        "=SUM(X80:Z1)", "=A0 + B1 - C2 + Z5", "=C0+ B1",Di2015NewLine                        "=$B$0+ AC1", "=AA12-ZZ34 + AZ1 - BZ2 - BX3 + BZX4",Di2015NewLine                        "=SUMX2MY2(A2:A8,B2:B8)",   // ensure function SUMX2MY2 isn't mistakenly incrementedDi2015NewLine                        "=$B$40 + 50 - 20"          // no matchDi2015NewLine                        //,"Check out T4 generation!"  // not a formula but it'll still increment T4, use formula.StartsWith("=")Di2015NewLine                        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // use this if you don't want to include regex commentsDi2015NewLine    //Regex rxCell = new Regex(@"(?<![$])\\b(?<col>[A-Z]+)(?<row>\\d+)\\b");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // regex comments in this style requires RegexOptions.IgnorePatternWhitespaceDi2015NewLine    string rxCellPattern = @"(?<![$])       # match if prefix is absent: $ symbol (prevents matching $A1 type of cells)Di2015NewLine                                            # (if all you have is $A$1 type of references, and not $A1 types, this negative look-behind isn't needed)Di2015NewLine                            \\b              # word boundary (prevents matching Excel functions with a similar pattern to a cell)Di2015NewLine                            (?<col>[A-Z]+)  # named capture group, match uppercase letter at least onceDi2015NewLine                                            # (change to [A-Za-z] if you have lowercase cells)Di2015NewLine                            (?<row>\\d+)     # named capture group, match a number at least onceDi2015NewLine                            \\b              # word boundaryDi2015NewLine                            ";Di2015NewLine    Regex rxCell = new Regex(rxCellPattern, RegexOptions.IgnorePatternWhitespace);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    foreach (string formula in formulas)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (rxCell.IsMatch(formula))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Formula: {0}", formula);Di2015NewLine            foreach (Match cell in rxCell.Matches(formula))Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("Cell: {0}, Col: {1}", cell.Value, cell.Groups["col"].Value);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // the magic happens hereDi2015NewLine            string newFormula = rxCell.Replace(formula, IncrementColumn);Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Modified: {0}", newFormula);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Not a match: {0}", formula);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineprivate static string IncrementColumn(Match m)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    string col = m.Groups["col"].Value;Di2015NewLine    char c;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // single character column name (ie. A1)Di2015NewLine    if (col.Length == 1)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        c = Convert.ToChar(col);Di2015NewLine        if (c == 'Z')Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // roll overDi2015NewLine            col = "AA";Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // advance to next charDi2015NewLine            c = (char)((int)c + 1);Di2015NewLine            col = c.ToString();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    elseDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // multi-character column name (ie. AB1)Di2015NewLine        // in this case work backwards to do some column name "arithmetic"Di2015NewLine        c = Convert.ToChar(col.Substring(col.Length - 1, 1));   // grab last letter of colDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (c == 'Z')Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string temp = "";Di2015NewLine            for (int i = col.Length - 1; i >= 0; i--)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // roll over should occurDi2015NewLine                if (col[i] == 'Z')Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    // prepend AA if current char is not the last char in column and its next neighbor was also a ZDi2015NewLine                    // ie. column BZZ: if current char is 1st Z, it's neighbor Z (2nd Z) just got incremented, so 1st Z becomes AADi2015NewLine                    if (i != col.Length - 1 && col[i + 1] == 'Z')Di2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        temp = "AA" + temp;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                    elseDi2015NewLine                    {Di2015NewLine                        // last char in column is Z, becomes A (this will happen first, before the above if branch ever happens)Di2015NewLine                        temp = "A" + temp;Di2015NewLine                    }Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine                elseDi2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    temp = ((char)((int)col[i] + 1)).ToString() + temp;Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            col = temp;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // advance charDi2015NewLine            c = (char)((int)c + 1);Di2015NewLine            // chop off final char in original column, append advanced charDi2015NewLine            col = col.Remove(col.Length - 1) + c.ToString();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    // updated column and original row (from regex match)Di2015NewLine    return col + m.Groups["row"].Value;Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
859995Di2015UniqueSeparatorFormula: Z1Di2015NewLineModified: AA1Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineFormula: ZZ1Di2015NewLineModified: AAA1Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineFormula: AZ1Di2015NewLineModified: BA1Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineFormula: AZB1Di2015NewLineModified: AZC1Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineFormula: BZZ2Di2015NewLineModified: CAAA2Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineFormula: =SUM($B$99:B99)Di2015NewLineModified: =SUM($B$99:C99)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineFormula: =SUM($F99:F99)Di2015NewLineModified: =SUM($F99:G99)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineFormula: =(SUM($B$0:B0)/SUM(1!$B$11:22!B33) -1)Di2015NewLineModified: =(SUM($B$0:C0)/SUM(1!$B$11:22!C33) -1)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineFormula: =SUM(X80:Z1)Di2015NewLineModified: =SUM(Y80:AA1)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineFormula: =A0 + B1 - C2 + Z5Di2015NewLineModified: =B0 + C1 - D2 + AA5Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineFormula: =C0+ B1Di2015NewLineModified: =D0+ C1Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineFormula: =$B$0+ AC1Di2015NewLineModified: =$B$0+ AD1Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineFormula: =AA12-ZZ34 + AZ1 - BZ2 - BX3 + BZX4Di2015NewLineModified: =AB12-AAA34 + BA1 - CA2 - BY3 + BZY4Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineFormula: =SUMX2MY2(A2:A8,B2:B8)Di2015NewLineModified: =SUMX2MY2(B2:B8,C2:C8)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineNot a match: =$B$40 + 50 - 20Di2015NewLine

860491Di2015UniqueSeparator        string stringValue = "testtesttesttest4notaduped+c+d+f+d+c+d+f+d+c+d+f+d+c+d+f+testtesttest";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        for(int i = 0; i < stringValue.Length; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int k = 1; (k*2) + i <= stringValue.Length; k++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int count = 1;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                string compare1 = stringValue.Substring(i,k);Di2015NewLine                string compare2 = stringValue.Substring(i + k, k);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                //Count if and how many duplicatesDi2015NewLine                while (compare1 == compare2) Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    count++;Di2015NewLine                    k += compare1.Length;Di2015NewLine                    if (i + k + compare1.Length > stringValue.Length)Di2015NewLine                        break;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                    compare2 = stringValue.Substring(i + k, compare1.Length);Di2015NewLine                } Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine                if (count > 1)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    //New code. 861112Di2015UniqueSeparator        # Obvious initialization.Di2015NewLine        movl    $14, -12(%ebp) Di2015NewLine        movl    $19, -16(%ebp)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        movl    -12(%ebp), %eax # This is moving "old x" to the accumulator.Di2015NewLine        movl    %eax, -8(%ebp) # Moving accumulator to a.Di2015NewLine        addl    $1, -12(%ebp) # Increment x (post-increment).Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        addl    $1, -16(%ebp) # Increment y (pre-increment)Di2015NewLine        movl    -16(%ebp), %eax # Move "new y" to accumulator.Di2015NewLine        movl    %eax, -8(%ebp) # Move accumulator to a.Di2015NewLine

864660Di2015UniqueSeparator// time range expressed as an example in "absolute" termsDi2015NewLineDateTime sd = new DateTime(2000, 1, 1, 9, 30, 0);Di2015NewLineDateTime ed = new DateTime(2000, 1, 2, 6, 0, 0);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine// time range expressed as a zero and range - "relative" termsDi2015NewLineTimeSpan zero = sd.TimeOfDay;Di2015NewLineTimeSpan range = ed.Subtract(sd);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine //the inputsDi2015NewLineList<DateTime> myList = new List<DateTime>()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  new DateTime(2009, 1, 1, 10, 0, 0),  //group1Di2015NewLine  new DateTime(2009, 1, 1, 17, 0, 0),  //group1Di2015NewLine  new DateTime(2009, 1, 2, 9, 0, 0),  //this is filteredDi2015NewLine  new DateTime(2009, 1, 2, 10, 0, 0),  //group2Di2015NewLine  new DateTime(2009, 1, 2, 15, 0, 0),  //group2Di2015NewLine  new DateTime(2009, 1, 3, 3, 0, 0),   //group2Di2015NewLine  new DateTime(2009, 1, 3, 7, 0, 0),  //this is filteredDi2015NewLine  new DateTime(2009, 1, 3, 10, 0, 0)   //group3Di2015NewLine};Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine  //at last, the query.Di2015NewLinevar query = myListDi2015NewLine  .Where(d => d.Subtract(zero).TimeOfDay < range)Di2015NewLine  .GroupBy(d => d.Subtract(zero).Date);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine //  output the resultsDi2015NewLineforeach (var g in query)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  Console.WriteLine("{0}", g.Count());Di2015NewLine  foreach (var d in g)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("  {0}", d);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

865679Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.IO;Di2015NewLineusing System.Text;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic static class ExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static string ReadWord(this TextReader reader)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        StringBuilder builder = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        int c;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Ignore any trailing whitespace from previous reads            Di2015NewLine        while ((c = reader.Read()) != -1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (!char.IsWhiteSpace((char) c))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // Finished?Di2015NewLine        if (c == -1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return null;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        builder.Append((char) c);Di2015NewLine        while ((c = reader.Read()) != -1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (char.IsWhiteSpace((char) c))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                break;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            builder.Append((char) c);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return builder.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinepublic class TestDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Give it a few challenges :)Di2015NewLine        string data = @"Four score     andDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLineseven years ago    ";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        using (TextReader reader = new StringReader(data))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            string word;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            while ((word = reader.ReadWord()) != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                Console.WriteLine("'{0}'", word);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
865679Di2015UniqueSeparator'Four'Di2015NewLine'score'Di2015NewLine'and'Di2015NewLine'seven'Di2015NewLine'years'Di2015NewLine'ago'Di2015NewLine
865801Di2015UniqueSeparator//asumming e is of type KeyEventArgs (such as it is Di2015NewLine// on a KeyDown event handlerDi2015NewLine// ..Di2015NewLinebool ctrlShiftM; //will be true if Ctrl + Shit + M is pressed, false otherwiseDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLinectrlShiftM = ((e.KeyCode == Keys.M) &&               // test for M pressedDi2015NewLine              ((e.Modifiers & Keys.Shift) != 0) &&   // test for Shift modifierDi2015NewLine              ((e.Modifiers & Keys.Control) != 0));  // test for Ctrl modifierDi2015NewLineif (ctrlShiftM == true)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    Console.WriteLine("[Ctrl] + [Shift] + M was pressed");Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
