876068Di2015UniqueSeparatorwc
876068Di2015UniqueSeparatorGetBalance
876068Di2015UniqueSeparatorwc
876068Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic class Balance : IDisposableDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    //ConstructorDi2015NewLine    WebClient wc;Di2015NewLine    public Balance()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        wc = new WebClient();Di2015NewLine        //Create event handler for the progress changed and download completed eventsDi2015NewLine        try {Di2015NewLine            wc.DownloadProgressChanged += new DownloadProgressChangedEventHandler(wc_DownloadProgressChanged);Di2015NewLine            wc.DownloadStringCompleted += new DownloadStringCompletedEventHandler(wc_DownloadStringCompleted);Di2015NewLine        } catch {Di2015NewLine            wc.Dispose();Di2015NewLine            throw;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    ~Balance()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        this.Dispose(false);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Get the current balance for the user that is logged in.Di2015NewLine    //If the balance returned from the server is NULL display error to the user.Di2015NewLine    //Null could occur if the DB has been stopped or the server is down.       Di2015NewLine    public void GetBalance(string sipUsername)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Remove the underscore ( _ ) from the username, as this is not needed to get the balance.Di2015NewLine        sipUsername = sipUsername.Remove(0, 1);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string strURL =Di2015NewLine            string.Format("https://www.xxxxxxx.com", Di2015NewLine            sipUsername);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        //Download only when the webclient is not busy.Di2015NewLine        if (!wc.IsBusy)Di2015NewLine        { Di2015NewLine            // Download the current balance.Di2015NewLine            wc.DownloadStringAsync(new Uri(strURL));             Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        elseDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Console.Write("Busy please try again");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //return and display the balance after the download has fully completedDi2015NewLine    void wc_DownloadStringCompleted(object sender, DownloadStringCompletedEventArgs e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        //Pass the result to the event handlerDi2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    private bool isDisposed = false;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Dispose of the balance objectDi2015NewLine    public void Dispose()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (!isDisposed)Di2015NewLine            Dispose(true);Di2015NewLine        GC.SuppressFinalize(this);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    //Remove the event handlersDi2015NewLine    private void Dispose(bool disposing)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        isDisposed = true;Di2015NewLine        if (disposing)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine\\\wc.DownloadProgressChanged -= new DownloadProgressChangedEventHandler(wc_DownloadProgressChanged);Di2015NewLine            wc.DownloadStringCompleted -= new DownloadStringCompletedEventHandler(wc_DownloadStringCompleted);Di2015NewLine            wc.Dispose();Di2015NewLine        }               Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
876200Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate List<xConnection> _sockets;Di2015NewLine
876200Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate System.Net.Sockets.Socket _serverSocket;Di2015NewLine
876200Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic bool Start()Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  System.Net.IPHostEntry localhost = System.Net.Dns.GetHostEntry(System.Net.Dns.GetHostName());Di2015NewLine  System.Net.IPEndPoint serverEndPoint;Di2015NewLine  tryDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine     serverEndPoint = new System.Net.IPEndPoint(localhost.AddressList[0], _port);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  catch (System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException e)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    throw new ArgumentOutOfRangeException("Port number entered would seem to be invalid, should be between 1024 and 65000", e);Di2015NewLine  }Di2015NewLine  tryDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    _serverSocket = new System.Net.Sockets.Socket(serverEndPoint.Address.AddressFamily, SocketType.Stream, ProtocolType.Tcp);Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine   catch (System.Net.Sockets.SocketException e)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine      throw new ApplicationException("Could not create socket, check to make sure not duplicating port", e);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      _serverSocket.Bind(serverEndPoint);Di2015NewLine      _serverSocket.Listen(_backlog);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine       throw new ApplicationException("Error occured while binding socket, check inner exception", e);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    tryDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine       //warning, only call this once, this is a bug in .net 2.0 that breaks if Di2015NewLine       // you're running multiple asynch accepts, this bug may be fixed, butDi2015NewLine       // it was a major pain in the ass previously, so make sure there is only oneDi2015NewLine       //BeginAccept runningDi2015NewLine       _serverSocket.BeginAccept(new AsyncCallback(acceptCallback), _serverSocket);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    catch (Exception e)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine       throw new ApplicationException("Error occured starting listeners, check inner exception", e);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    return true;Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine
876200Di2015UniqueSeparatorfalse
876200Di2015UniqueSeparator    private void acceptCallback(IAsyncResult result)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine       xConnection conn = new xConnection();Di2015NewLine       tryDi2015NewLine       {Di2015NewLine         //Finish accepting the connectionDi2015NewLine         System.Net.Sockets.Socket s = (System.Net.Sockets.Socket)result.AsyncState;Di2015NewLine         conn = new xConnection();Di2015NewLine         conn.socket = s.EndAccept(result);Di2015NewLine         conn.buffer = new byte[_bufferSize];Di2015NewLine         lock (_sockets)Di2015NewLine         {Di2015NewLine           _sockets.Add(conn);Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLine         //Queue recieving of data from the connectionDi2015NewLine         conn.socket.BeginReceive(conn.buffer, 0, conn.buffer.Length, SocketFlags.None, new AsyncCallback(ReceiveCallback), conn);Di2015NewLine         //Queue the accept of the next incomming connectionDi2015NewLine         _serverSocket.BeginAccept(new AsyncCallback(acceptCallback), _serverSocket);Di2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLine       catch (SocketException e)Di2015NewLine       {Di2015NewLine         if (conn.socket != null)Di2015NewLine         {Di2015NewLine           conn.socket.Close();Di2015NewLine           lock (_sockets)Di2015NewLine           {Di2015NewLine             _sockets.Remove(conn);Di2015NewLine           }Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLine         //Queue the next accept, think this should be here, stop attacks based on killing the waiting listenersDi2015NewLine         _serverSocket.BeginAccept(new AsyncCallback(acceptCallback), _serverSocket);Di2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLine       catch (Exception e)Di2015NewLine       {Di2015NewLine         if (conn.socket != null)Di2015NewLine         {Di2015NewLine           conn.socket.Close();Di2015NewLine           lock (_sockets)Di2015NewLine           {Di2015NewLine             _sockets.Remove(conn);Di2015NewLine           }Di2015NewLine         }Di2015NewLine         //Queue the next accept, think this should be here, stop attacks based on killing the waiting listenersDi2015NewLine         _serverSocket.BeginAccept(new AsyncCallback(acceptCallback), _serverSocket);Di2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine
876200Di2015UniqueSeparatorBeginReceive
876200Di2015UniqueSeparatoracceptCallback
876200Di2015UniqueSeparatorBeginReceive
876200Di2015UniqueSeparatorBeginReceive
876200Di2015UniqueSeparatorReceiveCallback
876200Di2015UniqueSeparatorprivate void ReceiveCallback(IAsyncResult result)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  //get our connection from the callbackDi2015NewLine  xConnection conn = (xConnection)result.AsyncState;Di2015NewLine  //catch any errors, we'd better not have anyDi2015NewLine  tryDi2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    //Grab our buffer and count the number of bytes receivesDi2015NewLine    int bytesRead = conn.socket.EndReceive(result);Di2015NewLine    //make sure we've read something, if we haven't it supposadly means that the client disconnectedDi2015NewLine    if (bytesRead > 0)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine      //put whatever you want to do when you receive data hereDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine      //Queue the next receiveDi2015NewLine      conn.socket.BeginReceive(conn.buffer, 0, conn.buffer.Length, SocketFlags.None, new AsyncCallback(ReceiveCallback), conn);Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine     elseDi2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine       //Callback run but no data, close the connectionDi2015NewLine       //supposadly means a disconnectDi2015NewLine       //and we still have to close the socket, even though we throw the event laterDi2015NewLine       conn.socket.Close();Di2015NewLine       lock (_sockets)Di2015NewLine       {Di2015NewLine         _sockets.Remove(conn);Di2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine   catch (SocketException e)Di2015NewLine   {Di2015NewLine     //Something went terribly wrongDi2015NewLine     //which shouldn't have happenedDi2015NewLine     if (conn.socket != null)Di2015NewLine     {Di2015NewLine       conn.socket.Close();Di2015NewLine       lock (_sockets)Di2015NewLine       {Di2015NewLine         _sockets.Remove(conn);Di2015NewLine       }Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine
876200Di2015UniqueSeparator//put whatever you want to do when you receive data hereDi2015NewLineDi2015NewLine//Queue the next receiveDi2015NewLineconn.socket.BeginReceive(conn.buffer, 0, conn.buffer.Length, SocketFlags.None, new AsyncCallback(ReceiveCallback), conn);Di2015NewLine

876200Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic bool Send(byte[] message, xConnection conn)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine  if (conn != null && conn.socket.Connected)Di2015NewLine  {Di2015NewLine    lock (conn.socket)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine    //we use a blocking mode send, no async on the outgoingDi2015NewLine    //since this is primarily a multithreaded application, shouldn't cause problems to send in blocking modeDi2015NewLine       conn.socket.Send(bytes, bytes.Length, SocketFlags.None);Di2015NewLine     }Di2015NewLine   }Di2015NewLine   elseDi2015NewLine     return false;Di2015NewLine   return true;Di2015NewLine }Di2015NewLine

880104Di2015UniqueSeparator    static void Update<TEntity>(DataContext dataContext, int id, TEntity obj)Di2015NewLine        where TEntity : classDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Update<TEntity, int>(dataContext, id, obj);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine    static void Update<TEntity, TKey>(DataContext dataContext, TKey id, TEntity obj)Di2015NewLine        where TEntity : classDi2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // get the row from the database using the meta-modelDi2015NewLine        MetaType meta = dataContext.Mapping.GetTable(typeof(TEntity)).RowType;Di2015NewLine        if(meta.IdentityMembers.Count != 1) throw new InvalidOperationException("Composite identity not supported");Di2015NewLine        string idName = meta.IdentityMembers[0].Member.Name;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var param = Expression.Parameter(typeof(TEntity), "row");Di2015NewLine        var lambda = Expression.Lambda<Func<TEntity,bool>>(Di2015NewLine            Expression.Equal(Di2015NewLine                Expression.PropertyOrField(param, idName),Di2015NewLine                Expression.Constant(id, typeof(TKey))), param);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        object dbRow = dataContext.GetTable<TEntity>().Single(lambda);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (MetaDataMember member in meta.DataMembers)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // don't copy IDDi2015NewLine            if (member.IsPrimaryKey) continue; // removed: || member.IsVersionDi2015NewLine            // (perhaps exclude associations and timestamp/rowversion? too)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // if you get problems, try using StorageAccessor instead -Di2015NewLine            // this will typically skip validation, etcDi2015NewLine            member.MemberAccessor.SetBoxedValue(Di2015NewLine                ref dbRow, member.MemberAccessor.GetBoxedValue(obj));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        // submit changes here?Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine

884346Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Reflection;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass TestDi2015NewLine{   Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Delegate[] delegates = new Delegate[]Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            (Action<int>) (x => Console.WriteLine("int={0}", x)),Di2015NewLine            (Action<string>) (x => Console.WriteLine("string={0}", x)),Di2015NewLine            (Func<int, int>) (x => x + 1)Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        MethodInfo genericPerformAction = typeof(Test).GetMethodDi2015NewLine                                                       ("PerformAction");Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (Delegate del in delegates)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            Type t = DiscoverTypeArgument(del, typeof(Action<>));Di2015NewLine            if (t == null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                // Wrong type (e.g. the Func in the array)Di2015NewLine                continue;Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            MethodInfo concreteMethod = genericPerformAction.MakeGenericMethodDi2015NewLine                (new[] { t } );Di2015NewLine            concreteMethod.Invoke(null, new object[] { del });Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void PerformAction<T>(Action<T> action)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Performing action with type {0}", typeof(T).Name);Di2015NewLine        action(default(T));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Discovers the type argument for an object based on a genericDi2015NewLine    /// class which may be somewhere in its class hierarchy. The genericDi2015NewLine    /// type must have exactly one type parameter.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>Di2015NewLine    /// The type argument, or null if the object wasn't inDi2015NewLine    /// the right hierarchy.Di2015NewLine    /// </returns>Di2015NewLine    static Type DiscoverTypeArgument(object o, Type genericType)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        if (o == null || genericType == null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentNullException();Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (genericType.IsInterface ||Di2015NewLine            !genericType.IsGenericTypeDefinition || Di2015NewLine            genericType.GetGenericArguments().Length != 1)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            throw new ArgumentException("Bad type");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Type objectType = o.GetType();Di2015NewLine        while (objectType != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (objectType.IsGenericType &&Di2015NewLine                objectType.GetGenericTypeDefinition() == genericType)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                return objectType.GetGenericArguments()[0];Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine            objectType = objectType.BaseType;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return null;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
884346Di2015UniqueSeparatorusing System;Di2015NewLineusing System.Reflection;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLineclass TestDi2015NewLine{   Di2015NewLine    static void Main()Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Delegate[] delegates = new Delegate[]Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            (Action<int>) (x => Console.WriteLine("int={0}", x)),Di2015NewLine            (Action<string>) (x => Console.WriteLine("string={0}", x)),Di2015NewLine            (Action<long>) (x => Console.WriteLine("long={0}", x)),Di2015NewLine        };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (dynamic del in delegates)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Yay for dynamic bindingDi2015NewLine            PerformAction(del);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public static void PerformAction<T>(Action<T> action)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Console.WriteLine("Performing action with type {0}", typeof(T).Name);Di2015NewLine        action(default(T));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

884911Di2015UniqueSeparatorstatic void CopyFiles(string dest, params string[] sources)Di2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    using (TextWriter writer = File.CreateText(dest))Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // Somewhat arbitrary limit, but it won't go on the large object heapDi2015NewLine        char[] buffer = new char[16 * 1024]; Di2015NewLine        foreach (string source in sources)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            using (TextReader reader = File.OpenText(source))Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                int charsRead;Di2015NewLine                while ((charsRead = reader.Read(buffer, 0, buffer.Length)) > 0)Di2015NewLine                {Di2015NewLine                    writer.Write(buffer, 0, charsRead);Di2015NewLine                }Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

886909Di2015UniqueSeparatorclass ParameterizedKeyNotFoundException<T> : KeyNotFoundException {Di2015NewLine    public T InvalidKey { get; private set; }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    public ParameterizedKeyNotFoundException(T InvalidKey) {Di2015NewLine        this.InvalidKey = InvalidKey;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLinestatic class Program {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static TValue Get<TKey, TValue>(this IDictionary<TKey, TValue> Dict, TKey Key) {Di2015NewLine        TValue res;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (Dict.TryGetValue(Key, out res))Di2015NewLine            return res;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        throw new ParameterizedKeyNotFoundException<TKey>(Key);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    static void Main(string[] args) {Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        var x = new Dictionary<string, int>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        x.Add("foo", 42);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        try {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(x.Get("foo"));Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine(x.Get("bar"));Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (ParameterizedKeyNotFoundException<string> e) {Di2015NewLine            Console.WriteLine("Invalid key: {0}", e.InvalidKey);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        Console.ReadKey();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

888352Di2015UniqueSeparatorpublic static class ExtensionsDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    public static string ToCSV(this DataTable table)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var result = new StringBuilder();Di2015NewLine        for (int i = 0; i < table.Columns.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            result.Append(table.Columns[i].ColumnName);Di2015NewLine            result.Append(i == table.Columns.Count - 1 ? "\\n" : ",");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        foreach (DataRow row in table.Rows)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            for (int i = 0; i < table.Columns.Count; i++)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                result.Append(row[i].ToString());Di2015NewLine                result.Append(i == table.Columns.Count - 1 ? "\\n" : ",");Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return result.ToString();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine

889486Di2015UniqueSeparator/// <summary>Di2015NewLine/// Worker class that collects comments from a Word document and exports them as ReviewItemsDi2015NewLine/// </summary>Di2015NewLineinternal class ReviewItemCollectorDi2015NewLine{Di2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Working documentDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    private Word.Document WorkingDoc = new Word.DocumentClass();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Extracts the review results from a Word documentDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="fileName">Fully qualified path of the file to be evaluated</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    public ReviewResult GetReviewResults(string fileName)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Word.Application wordApp = null;Di2015NewLine        List<ReviewItem> reviewItems = new List<ReviewItem>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        object missing = System.Reflection.Missing.Value;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        tryDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            // Fire up WordDi2015NewLine            wordApp = new Word.ApplicationClass();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Some object variables because the Word API requires thisDi2015NewLine            object fileNameForWord = fileName;Di2015NewLine            object readOnly = true;Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            WorkingDoc = wordApp.Documents.Open(ref fileNameForWord,Di2015NewLine                ref missing, ref readOnly,Di2015NewLine                ref missing, ref missing, ref missing, ref missing, ref missing,Di2015NewLine                ref missing, ref missing, ref missing, ref missing, ref missing,Di2015NewLine                ref missing, ref missing, ref missing);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // Gather all paragraphs that are chapter headers, sorted by their start positionDi2015NewLine            var headers = (from Word.Paragraph p in WorkingDoc.ParagraphsDi2015NewLine                           where IsHeading(p)Di2015NewLine                           select new Heading()Di2015NewLine                           {Di2015NewLine                               Text = GetHeading(p),Di2015NewLine                               Start = p.Range.StartDi2015NewLine                           }).ToList().OrderBy(h => h.Start);Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            reviewItems.AddRange(FindComments(headers));Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine            // I will be doing similar things with Revisions in the documentDi2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        catch (Exception x)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            MessageBox.Show(x.ToString(), Di2015NewLine                "Error while collecting review items", Di2015NewLine                MessageBoxButtons.OK, Di2015NewLine                MessageBoxIcon.Error);Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        finallyDi2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            if (wordApp != null)Di2015NewLine            {Di2015NewLine                object doNotSave = Word.WdSaveOptions.wdDoNotSaveChanges;Di2015NewLine                wordApp.Quit(ref doNotSave, ref missing, ref missing);Di2015NewLine            }Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        ReviewResult result = new ReviewResult();Di2015NewLine        result.Items = reviewItems.OrderBy(i => i.Position);Di2015NewLine        return result;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Finds all comments in the document and converts them to review itemsDi2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns>List of ReviewItems generated from comments</returns>Di2015NewLine    private List<ReviewItem> FindComments(IOrderedEnumerable<Heading> headers)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        List<ReviewItem> result = new List<ReviewItem>();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Generate ReviewItems from the comments in the documentsDi2015NewLine        var reviewItems = from Word.Comment c in WorkingDoc.CommentsDi2015NewLine                          select new ReviewItem()Di2015NewLine                          {Di2015NewLine                              Position = c.Scope.Start,Di2015NewLine                              Page = GetPageNumberOfRange(c.Scope),Di2015NewLine                              Paragraph = GetHeaderForRange(headers, c.Scope),Di2015NewLine                              Description = c.Range.Text,Di2015NewLine                              ItemType = DetermineCommentType(c)Di2015NewLine                          };Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return reviewItems.ToList();Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Brute force translation of comment type based on the contents...Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="c"></param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    private static string DetermineCommentType(Word.Comment c)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        // This code is very specific to my solution, might be made more flexible/configurableDi2015NewLine        // For now, this works :-)Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        string text = c.Range.Text.ToLower();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (text.EndsWith("?"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return "Vraag";Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (text.Contains("spelling") || text.Contains("spelfout"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return "Spelling";Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (text.Contains("typfout") || text.Contains("typefout"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return "Typefout";Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        if (text.ToLower().Contains("omissie"))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return "Omissie";Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        return "Opmerking";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Determine the last header before the given range's start position. That would be the chapter the range is part of.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="headings">List of headings as identified in the document.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="range">The current range</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    private static string GetHeaderForRange(IEnumerable<Heading> headings, Word.Range range)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        var found = (from h in headingsDi2015NewLine                     where h.Start <= range.StartDi2015NewLine                     select h).LastOrDefault();Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        if (found != null)Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            return found.Text;Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return "Unknown";Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Identifies whether a paragraph is a heading, based on its styling.Di2015NewLine    /// Note: the documents we're reviewing are always in a certain format, we can assume that headersDi2015NewLine    /// have a style named "Heading..." or "Kop..."Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="paragraph">The paragraph to be evaluated.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    private static bool IsHeading(Word.Paragraph paragraph)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        Word.Style style = paragraph.get_Style() as Word.Style;Di2015NewLine        return (style != null && style.NameLocal.StartsWith("Heading") || style.NameLocal.StartsWith("Kop"));Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Translates a paragraph into the form we want to see: preferably the chapter/paragraph number, otherwise theDi2015NewLine    /// title itself will do.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="paragraph">The paragraph to be translated</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    private static string GetHeading(Word.Paragraph paragraph)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        string heading = "";Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine        // Try to get the list number, otherwise just take the entire heading textDi2015NewLine        heading = paragraph.Range.ListFormat.ListString;Di2015NewLine        if (string.IsNullOrEmpty(heading))Di2015NewLine        {Di2015NewLine            heading = paragraph.Range.Text;Di2015NewLine            heading = Regex.Replace(heading, "\\\\s+$", "");Di2015NewLine        }Di2015NewLine        return heading;Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLineDi2015NewLine    /// <summary>Di2015NewLine    /// Determines the pagenumber of a range.Di2015NewLine    /// </summary>Di2015NewLine    /// <param name="range">The range to be located.</param>Di2015NewLine    /// <returns></returns>Di2015NewLine    private static int GetPageNumberOfRange(Word.Range range)Di2015NewLine    {Di2015NewLine        return (int)range.get_Information(Word.WdInformation.wdActiveEndPageNumber);Di2015NewLine    }Di2015NewLine}Di2015NewLine
